story:
Note: English follows - see the purple titles.


Gusta sera une fabrique végane.

Située au marché Jean-Talon, à Montréal - et première du genre au Québec – Gusta produira des aliments 100 % véganes : saucisses et autres charcuteries, fromages à gratiner et tartinades.

Les produits seront aussi distribués dans les épiceries.

Gusta sera également une boutique-comptoir.

On pourra y goûter et acheter tous les produits réguliers de Gusta, en format d’épicerie ou en vrac, mais également des produits saisonniers qui ne seront disponibles qu’à la boutique.

Un petit coin restauration proposera des mets gourmands et réconfortants élaborés à partir des produits Gusta.

Gusta élaborera des produits savoureux, sains et 100% naturels, faits avec des ingrédients locaux le plus possible:

Des charcuteries végétales faites à partir de protéine de blé ou de lupin, avec des saveurs authentiques et sans prétention.

Des fromages à gratiner faits à partir d’huile de coco et de laits végétaux.

Des tartinades de graines de tournesol, agrémentées de savoureux légumes.

Les mets offerts à la boutique exploreront sans complexe et de façon gourmande les différents produits de Gusta: «grilled-cheese», «smoked-seitan» et autres poutines véganes pourront être dégustés, accompagnés d’une bière de microbrasserie ou d’un autre breuvage local.

En inaugurant ce nouveau commerce dans un lieu tout indiqué comme le marché Jean-Talon, nous souhaitons créer une nouvelle adresse pour rassembler tous les foodies, qu’ils soient véganes, végétariens, flexitariens ou omnivores. Gusta ne fabrique pas de la fausse viande ou de faux fromages, mais plutôt des produits authentiques et gourmets!

Mon nom est Sylvain Karpinski. Je suis un jeune entrepreneur d’origine suisso-polonaise et végétalien depuis plus de 10 ans. 

L’idée de Gusta date de l’été 2014 où je désirais cuisiner des plats pour une amie dont le bébé souffrait de plusieurs allergies, dont la protéine bovine, le soya et les produits laitiers. Je me suis alors mis à explorer la protéine de blé, me rappelant les produits que j'aimais consommer en Europe. J'ai ensuite réalisé à quel point la presque totalité des produits véganes et végétariens se trouvant dans les épiceries était importée de la côte ouest des États-Unis. Ce fut le point tournant qui m'a inspiré à travailler sur un projet qui pourrait offrir une alternative locale et représentative de mes valeurs : des produits abordables, bons pour la santé, pour l’environnement, locaux et gourmands.


Pour ajouter le montant de la livraison au Canada hors Montréal, il vous suffit de l'ajouter dans "Custom" sous "Additional Gift", qui se retrouve sous la récompense une fois choisie.

Frais Indiegogo (10%): Indiegogo et Paypal prennent une commission sur l'argent amassé et les transactions faites, représentant environ 10%.

Vous avez des questions, des commentaires, des suggestions? Vous pouvez nous écrire à info@gustafoods.com ou dans Indiegogo directement.

Vous pouvez aussi nous suivre sur notre page Facebook.

Gusta will be a vegan factory.

Located in the Jean-Talon market, in Montreal – the first of its kind in Quebec – Gusta will produce a variety of 100% vegan foods: sausages and other charcuterie, grating cheeses, and spreads.

The products will be distributed through grocery stores as well.

Gusta will also be a concept store.

Here you will be able to taste and buy all Gusta products, in bulk at the counter or as you would find them at the grocery store. Seasonal products – exclusive to the store – will also be available.

You’ll even find a restaurant area to enjoy appetizing & comforting dishes prepared with Gusta products.

Gusta will develop delicious, healthy, and 100% natural products, made with locally-sourced ingredients whenever possible:

Vegetable charcuterie made from wheat protein or lupine, with authentic flavors but without pretence.

Grating cheeses made from coconut oil and plant-based milks.

Sunflower seeds spreads, complemented with tasty vegetables.

The dishes offered at the boutique will showcase different Gusta products in a wide range of classic dishes: come enjoy a “grilled-cheese”, a “smoked seitan”, and other vegan poutines along with a microbrew or other locally-produced beverages.

By choosing the Jean-Talon market as our location to open this new store, we want to create a destination where foodies will gather, whether they are vegans, vegetarians, flexitarians or omnivorous. Gusta does not produce faux meat and faux cheese: we produce authentic and gourmet products!

My name is Sylvain Karpinski. I'm a young Swiss-Polish entrepreneur and a vegan for over 10 years.

I had the idea for Gusta during the 2014 summer : I wanted to prepare meals for a friend's baby who was allergic to a lot of things: bovine protein, soy and dairy products. I then set out to explore the wheat protein that reminded me of products I used to eat and enjoy in Europe. I then realized how almost all vegan and vegetarian products found in grocery stores were imported from the West Coast of the United States. This was the turning point that inspired me to work on a project that could provide a local alternative and be representative of my values: affordable products but that are also healthy, ecofriendly, local and delicious.


To add the shipping costs for delivery outside Montreal, but in Canada: it's simple! Add the shipping costs in the "Custom" field under "Additional Gift". It can be found under the reward, once it has been selected.

Indiegogo Fees (10%): Indiegogo and Paypal take a commission on the money raised during the campaign, which equals approximately to 10%.

Questions, comments, suggestions? Send us a message at info@gustafoods.com or directly on Indiegogo.

You can also follow us on Facebook!

story:
Organic, fresh roasted coffee benefiting local artists

Waldo's & Company is a non-profit arts organization focused on providing low cost art equipment to local artists and a space to engage with our creative community. Alongside being a local art hub, we've also been roasting and brewing some of the best coffee in the area since the very beginning of our organization.  A lot of people's first interaction with our space is stopping by to get a freshly brewed cup of coffee, which we continue to offer for donations only. These donations and the proceeds from selling our whole bean coffee have become central to our operations. In fact, the money that we make from coffee sales is one of the main ways that we pay our overhead costs (rent, insurance, utilities, etc), so that we can keep access to our space affordable for artists. 

We started roasting coffee back in 2013 on a tiny, out-of-date roaster which is only capable of roasting 6 lbs an hour. Over the past few years, demand for our coffee beans has grown and we are now desperately in need of upgrading to a more efficient roaster. We've got our eyes on a cute little roaster that can crank out 25 lbs an hour, which will be more than enough to handle our needs for years to come.

By giving to this project, you'll be helping to ensure low cost access to art equipment in Gettysburg for years to come, as well as getting amazing coffee for a year!

What We Need

We need to raise $8000.00 to buy a roaster that can efficiently handle our roasting needs. Here's a link to the roaster we would like to buy: BC Coffee Roaster

We hope to fund this purchase almost entirely through whole bean coffee subscriptions.

What You Get

You get a coffee subscription for fresh roasted, organic coffee that benefits local artists.

You can choose how many pounds of coffee you'd like to receive on a monthly basis and whether you'd like to pick it up from Waldo's or have it delivered to your door. Each subscription lasts one year, starting in January 2021. 

We also have a few other coffee related items that you can choose or add to your subscription.

The Impact

By choosing to buy your coffee from Waldo's, you'll be helping us greatly increase our coffee roasting capabilities which will in turn greatly increase our ability to provide local artists with the resources they need to thrive. We've built a community of folks that are passionate about the arts, community, and great coffee. We'd like to see this continue to grow for many years to come.

story:
Help us create the world's BEST hydration/sports drink for "everyday" doers, hustlers and athletes. 

 

There's a new sports drink in town...and she's got game.

How many hydration and sports drinks have YOU consumed in your lifetime?  I recently had to ask myself the same thing.

Well, between my NCAA Championship college basketball career at The University of Texas to my professional career with the WNBA Champion Houston Comets & Utah Starzz, to my USA National and Olympic team experiences, to my international professional careers in Italy and Switzerland -- I'm guessing I've consumed at least 25,000 gallons of sports drinks and hydration beverages.  I stopped counting a long time ago.

My name's Fran Harris (purple/pink blouse in the photo below) and given my extensive sports background, you might think that the idea for Electra hydration & sports drinks was born 10 or more years ago...but it wasn't.    

University of Texas 34-0 NCAA Championship Basketball Team, photo credit Susan Sigmon

In fact, the story of Electra began after one fateful race in the early Spring of 2019. 

I was volunteering for a 5K and saw a trio of folks who looked like they could use some encouragement early in the race, so I decided to run/walk with them. Ya know, to show solidarity. It's always felt great to be a part of something bigger than I am -- and to support a great cause at the same time. 

But within a few minutes of "supporting" these eager beaver runners, it became respiratorily apparent, to me at least, that not only had I NOT trained for this 5K, but that I also had no idea how I was going to tell them that I was a basketball player -- not a semi-long distance runner -- and that I was about to make a U-turn and head back to the snack table. 

By this time, my new friends were feeding off of my early enthusiasm and now apparently wanted me to continue running with them the ENTIRE 3.2 miles. It's at that point when I said, "Welp, looks like you guys can take it from here." 

Then, I attempted to walk off the trail.

"Nooooooo," the three of them said in unison. "You can't leave now. You're on our team" 

I am? I thought. Instead, I smiled and kept run-walking. "Right," I said, trying to catch my breath. "Go team".

About 37 minutes later as we were crossing the finish line, someone rushed over to hand me a bottle of a popular sports drink -- because I'm sure I looked like I needed it. 

As she screwed the top off of the plastic bottle, a funny thing happened. For some reason, just as I was about to chug it down, I looked at the nutrition panel. WOW. 

I couldn't believe my eyes.  I'd been drinking this stuff most of my college and professional careers - and honestly, I had never paid a whole lot of attention to the ingredients. What I saw actually horrified me. 

That day, Electra was born.  

That day, I made a commitment to build an iconic brand, led by best-for-you, functional hydration drinks that moms could feel good about giving their kids, everyday hustlers could drink throughout their day, and athletes could consume with confidence -- knowing that it was fuel for them.

A week later, I hired a CPG (consumer packaged goods) advisor who helped lead a beverage company from $30 to $70 million in three years. 

Because I'd worked in sales and retail for Procter & Gamble, selling consumer packaged goods, I was familiar with the world of selling food, beverages and health & beauty. That experience was, and is still, a big plus. After I committed to launching Electra I had to figure out exactly what I wanted this new company -- and this first product -- to be. I went to work on hiring a team of outstanding CPG experts who I could contract to help me take Electra from idea to innovation to reality. 

First stop? Survey the marketplace. My time at P&G had taught me the importance of market research. Data was everything, and we all know numbers never lie. Research showed that the sports drink category is ripe for growth. Projected to be a $23 billion dollar industry by the end of 2020 (those were pre-COVID-19 estimates, by the way). Source: Statista.com

The results of the survey provided critical data to move forward. 43% of our respondents said they'd try a new sports drink and possibly switch from their current brand if there were a great tasting, better for you option on the market. BOOM! 

Next step? Formulating the product.

It had to be better than good. It needed to be AMAZING. I reached out to my food and beverage network to get recommendations for the best formulators in the world and I definitely found a gem. It was so much fun describing how Electra might taste to Jaime. Within weeks we had our first crack at Electra.  It was actually happening. I could not believe it. And it was so exciting when these three bottles below arrived for tasting and testing.

After many rounds of focus groups, testing, feedback and learning, we had our formulation -- and our 3 skus - Passion Punch, Litty Lemonade & Oh Yeah! Orange.

So, what's inside the bottle? Electra is curated from the best nature has to offer.  It starts with electrolyte-rich organic watermelon water and coconut water concentrate. Then we added a potent blend of vitamins B, C, and D and amino acids to give you energy to get through your day, task or workout. But wait there's more -- it has ZERO added sugar, no artificial colors or flavors, and one 16 oz bottle has a third of the calories of our top competitors.  But best of all -- Electra tastes great! 

We were almost there. It was time to think about the packaging, which meant finding bottles, caps and most importantly, a designer who understood ELECTRA.

We were on a roll. But then...something happened that nobody predicted or prepared for: COVID-19. 

It changed everything.  Electra and all operations shut down. Our suppliers were closed. They couldn't get raw materials from their suppliers. It was a hot mess. So, we used the time to deepen our connection with our target audience and develop strategic partnerships. We did more surveys, talked to industry experts, revamped marketing strategy, and made adjustments to the business and launch plans including recruiting potential staff and team members through virtual interviews. Oh, and we created some dope tshirts too!

Every great company starts with a great team.  The Core Four professionals and executives who helped me develop and bring Electra to market are still connected to the brand either in an advisory or independent contractor capacity.  50+ years of CPG experience!!!!

BIG problem + Great product + Great team + Great backers = SUCCESS.

Now it's time to create some buzz. Getting the word out for Electra will be fun -- as I have TONS of media experience and connections. We will make the media rounds with magazines, print, radio, podcasts, blogs and of course, television. 

Fran on Good Morning America with Robin Roberts

 

How We've Gotten This Far

Electra has been bootstrapped and angeled by some fantastic friends and family members who believed in me and this company. They include ...

✅  My ace, my cousin, culinary-background firefighter who basically said, "Whatever you're building, I'm riding with you". He also did a fantastic job of raising his two adolescent daughters after his wife died in 2012. They're both in college today and looking forward to being Electra ambassadors.

✅   A former Dallas NBC news anchor and activist who, along with her husband, are raising triplet teenage girls plus, a son who champions diversity, equity and inclusion.

✅   A dynamic couple from my hometown of Dallas, Texas, he's a retired fireman, she's a pharma sales dynamo - together they stepped up with great enthusiasm and faith in what we're building with Electra.

✅   Another enthusiastic couple from my hometown of Dallas, Texas, who have a passion for health & wellness. She's a retired educator & psychology professor and yes, he's a retired firefighter. Apparently, we love firefighters at Electra. 

✅   And just in the past week, we've gotten interest from some cool folks including more firefighters, NFL Hall of Famers, NBA Hall of Famers, WNBA champions, fitness bloggers and more!

The quality of individuals we've attracted as advisors, partners, teammates and investors is proof that we're building something special with Electra.  And that's why I hope you join the movement, back us and become an Electralyte!

You can help bring Electra to the market. YOU. Your contribution will make THE difference. Imagine how you'll feel when you see an Electra bottle online or on a shelf in your favorite stores - you'll know that YOU were a part of making Electra a reality.  That really excites me. I've been a part of great teams all my life and nothing feels as good as setting a goal and then crossing the finish line with people who believed in you. 

Plus, when you back Electra today, you'll get some super cool perks including tshirts, caps, digital wallpaper, invitation to Electra events, and much more (perks depends on contribution LEVEL).

So, here's what your backing will allow us to accomplish:

➡️   Manufacturing + Marketing + Sales + Logistics (make, market, sell and deliver Electra)

That's right. Your contribution helps us manufacture our first BIG run of Electra -- which means that you will be there from DAY ONE.  Aside from creating mouthwatering functional beverages, our mission is to champion causes that bring epic levels of hope, health and humanity to the world.

One last important thing, here's the timeline for the rest of 2020.  Remember, you'll get updates every other week on our LIVE "Backer Only" Update calls.  Can't wait to see you there.

Thank you for backing Electra. We look forward to sharing our many successes each month in our private backer live streams. FOLLOW US! @iDrinkElectra 

Share with your network, friends and family, and let's make IndieGoGo history!

 

Risks and challenges

Our team is committed to manufacturing the highest quality beverages, with all-natural ingredients. We have curated supremely technical specifications for this brand. We've sought out the best vendors, co-packers, suppliers, and contractors to deliver the best product and customer experience. There are always risks and challenges associated with the production of any product, including beverages at scale. That's why we are committed to transparent communication on everything from production to delivery to product updates. When you become a backer you will be among the first groups to be notified of any updates during and after our campaign. We will establish a communication schedule and notify you of scheduled dates adn times for updates, which may vary from time to time. Following the successful completion of our campaign, we plan to go into production in August and ship your rewards starting in September, and continuing through October or November 2020. We hope that the uncertainty brought about by COVID-19 will at least be more predictable and manageable. Assuming our supply chain isn't drastically impacted by COVID-19 or other economic factors, we are confident in our ability to deliver on schedule with the highest level of quality. If anything changes, we will communicate in our bi-weekly "Backer Updates", so please keep your contact information (email and phone number) updated in our database. Thank you for joining us on this exciting trek to create best in class nutritional products for everyday doers, hustlers, and athletes all over the world. With your support, I know we will deliver on this great mission. Please note that current images, photos, graphics and information may change throughout the campaign and that the final design or products may vary or be completely different than what you see on this website.
story_txt:
Help us create the world's BEST hydration/sports drink for "everyday" doers, hustlers and athletes. 
 
There's a new sports drink in town...and she's got game.
How many hydration and sports drinks have YOU consumed in your lifetime?  I recently had to ask myself the same thing.
Well, between my NCAA Championship college basketball career at The University of Texas to my professional career with the WNBA Champion Houston Comets & Utah Starzz, to my USA National and Olympic team experiences, to my international professional careers in Italy and Switzerland -- I'm guessing I've consumed at least 25,000 gallons of sports drinks and hydration beverages.  I stopped counting a long time ago.
My name's Fran Harris (purple/pink blouse in the photo below) and given my extensive sports background, you might think that the idea for Electra hydration & sports drinks was born 10 or more years ago...but it wasn't.    

University of Texas 34-0 NCAA Championship Basketball Team, photo credit Susan Sigmon
In fact, the story of Electra began after one fateful race in the early Spring of 2019. 
I was volunteering for a 5K and saw a trio of folks who looked like they could use some encouragement early in the race, so I decided to run/walk with them. Ya know, to show solidarity. It's always felt great to be a part of something bigger than I am -- and to support a great cause at the same time. 
But within a few minutes of "supporting" these eager beaver runners, it became respiratorily apparent, to me at least, that not only had I NOT trained for this 5K, but that I also had no idea how I was going to tell them that I was a basketball player -- not a semi-long distance runner -- and that I was about to make a U-turn and head back to the snack table. 
By this time, my new friends were feeding off of my early enthusiasm and now apparently wanted me to continue running with them the ENTIRE 3.2 miles. It's at that point when I said, "Welp, looks like you guys can take it from here." 
Then, I attempted to walk off the trail.
"Nooooooo," the three of them said in unison. "You can't leave now. You're on our team" 
I am? I thought. Instead, I smiled and kept run-walking. "Right," I said, trying to catch my breath. "Go team".
About 37 minutes later as we were crossing the finish line, someone rushed over to hand me a bottle of a popular sports drink -- because I'm sure I looked like I needed it. 
As she screwed the top off of the plastic bottle, a funny thing happened. For some reason, just as I was about to chug it down, I looked at the nutrition panel. WOW. 
I couldn't believe my eyes.  I'd been drinking this stuff most of my college and professional careers - and honestly, I had never paid a whole lot of attention to the ingredients. What I saw actually horrified me. 
That day, Electra was born.  

That day, I made a commitment to build an iconic brand, led by best-for-you, functional hydration drinks that moms could feel good about giving their kids, everyday hustlers could drink throughout their day, and athletes could consume with confidence -- knowing that it was fuel for them.
A week later, I hired a CPG (consumer packaged goods) advisor who helped lead a beverage company from $30 to $70 million in three years. 
Because I'd worked in sales and retail for Procter & Gamble, selling consumer packaged goods, I was familiar with the world of selling food, beverages and health & beauty. That experience was, and is still, a big plus. After I committed to launching Electra I had to figure out exactly what I wanted this new company -- and this first product -- to be. I went to work on hiring a team of outstanding CPG experts who I could contract to help me take Electra from idea to innovation to reality. 

First stop? Survey the marketplace. My time at P&G had taught me the importance of market research. Data was everything, and we all know numbers never lie. Research showed that the sports drink category is ripe for growth. Projected to be a $23 billion dollar industry by the end of 2020 (those were pre-COVID-19 estimates, by the way). Source: Statista.com
The results of the survey provided critical data to move forward. 43% of our respondents said they'd try a new sports drink and possibly switch from their current brand if there were a great tasting, better for you option on the market. BOOM! 
Next step? Formulating the product. 
It had to be better than good. It needed to be AMAZING. I reached out to my food and beverage network to get recommendations for the best formulators in the world and I definitely found a gem. It was so much fun describing how Electra might taste to Jaime. Within weeks we had our first crack at Electra.  It was actually happening. I could not believe it. And it was so exciting when these three bottles below arrived for tasting and testing.

After many rounds of focus groups, testing, feedback and learning, we had our formulation -- and our 3 skus - Passion Punch, Litty Lemonade & Oh Yeah! Orange.
So, what's inside the bottle? Electra is curated from the best nature has to offer.  It starts with electrolyte-rich organic watermelon water and coconut water concentrate. Then we added a potent blend of vitamins B, C, and D and amino acids to give you energy to get through your day, task or workout. But wait there's more -- it has ZERO added sugar, no artificial colors or flavors, and one 16 oz bottle has a third of the calories of our top competitors.  But best of all -- Electra tastes great! 
We were almost there. It was time to think about the packaging, which meant finding bottles, caps and most importantly, a designer who understood ELECTRA.

We were on a roll. But then...something happened that nobody predicted or prepared for: COVID-19. 
It changed everything.  Electra and all operations shut down. Our suppliers were closed. They couldn't get raw materials from their suppliers. It was a hot mess. So, we used the time to deepen our connection with our target audience and develop strategic partnerships. We did more surveys, talked to industry experts, revamped marketing strategy, and made adjustments to the business and launch plans including recruiting potential staff and team members through virtual interviews. Oh, and we created some dope tshirts too!

Every great company starts with a great team.  The Core Four professionals and executives who helped me develop and bring Electra to market are still connected to the brand either in an advisory or independent contractor capacity.  50+ years of CPG experience!!!!

BIG problem + Great product + Great team + Great backers = SUCCESS.
Now it's time to create some buzz. Getting the word out for Electra will be fun -- as I have TONS of media experience and connections. We will make the media rounds with magazines, print, radio, podcasts, blogs and of course, television. 

Fran on Good Morning America with Robin Roberts
 
How We've Gotten This Far
Electra has been bootstrapped and angeled by some fantastic friends and family members who believed in me and this company. They include ...

✅   A dynamic couple from my hometown of Dallas, Texas, he's a retired fireman, she's a pharma sales dynamo - together they stepped up with great enthusiasm and faith in what we're building with Electra.
✅   Another enthusiastic couple from my hometown of Dallas, Texas, who have a passion for health & wellness. She's a retired educator & psychology professor and yes, he's a retired firefighter. Apparently, we love firefighters at Electra. 
✅   And just in the past week, we've gotten interest from some cool folks including more firefighters, NFL Hall of Famers, NBA Hall of Famers, WNBA champions, fitness bloggers and more!

The quality of individuals we've attracted as advisors, partners, teammates and investors is proof that we're building something special with Electra.  And that's why I hope you join the movement, back us and become an Electralyte!

story:
JOIN US ON OUR JOURNEY TO THE MOST AUTHENTIC & SINGLE-ORIGIN TRUFFLE OILS

You who love authentic, tasty and healthy food, did you know that most truffle oils on the market contain no actual truffles? Did you know that the white truffle is not exclusively Italian but that it grows naturally in countries like Croatia, Serbia, Hungary and just tastes amazing!   

We bring you the first authentic truffle oils prepared through our patented technology with white truffles from Italy, Hungary and Croatia. Join us on a sensory journey and discover unexpected flavor differences!

The white truffle naturally grows in Italy and many Eastern European countries (green on the map). A bit similarly to wine tasting you will be able to enjoy the elegant cheesy and garlicky flavor of Italian white truffles, the surprising aromatic complexity of Hungarian truffles and the divinely intense flavor of Croatian truffles. 

Read more about this discovery here: 

- Smithsonian Magazine

- Microbe Magazine

“With our technology, we can release the aromatic potential of truffles through fermentation and thus have availability throughout the year. Similar to the influence of terroir on wines, we can bring out regional differences in truffle flavors and would like to share these with you.” - Richard Splivallo

On the quest of ultimate flavors!

NBROSIA is a brand of Nectariss Sàrl, an authentic flavor startup that aims at making a difference in the specialty food market by developing sustainable food with novel natural flavors through the patent backed-technology invented by its founders.

NBROSIA´s team is made of Diana & Richard, two passionate foodies on the quest of ultimate flavors. Diana brings in over ten years of in-depth experience in the food industry, and truffle expert Richard contributes his expertise on truffle fungi.

story:
Miss Moffett's moved our bakery/cafe to the Capital Mall on December 23, 2018. After just over 4 months of being open for business, we have been told the Capital Mall will not renew our lease. We are closed permanently, and need a place to bake our delicious, award-winning, "As Seen on Cupcake Wars" gluten-free, vegan and keto cupcakes and pastries. 

This news came as a shock to us and we only have a few days to move out. We are looking for a permanent "home", one where the community will always be able to access our special treats, and one where we will always be able to create these treats. We love providing baked goods for people with special dietary needs, who can't find treats like these anywhere else. We are extremely passionate about the magic and creativity behind the items we make, and the service they provide to our community.

Contribute to Miss Moffett's today. If you can't contribute, you can help by spreading the word. If you know someone who might be interested in becoming an investor in Miss Moffett's, have them contact rachel@mysticalcupcakes.com. For information about Miss Moffett's, please visit www.missmoffetts.com find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/missmoffettscomfortkitchen and www.facebook.com/mysticalcupcakes.

story:
Overview

We are Felipe and Marcela from Simon's Hot Dogs in Scottsdale. We want to bring Colombian Hot Dogs to as many people as possible, and the best way to do that is by adding a food truck to the streets of Phoenix Metropolitan Area that serves Beef, Pork and Vegan hot dogs, crispy fries load with toppings and some delicious Colombian appetizers.

In Colombia, we take our hot dogs very seriously. All throughout our childhood, we looked forward to the meals where we could enjoy a good hot dog, and when we moved to the United States we learned more about the food culture outside our country,  we realized that the gourmet hot dog was something unique to where we lived. Colombian-style hot dogs are a delicacy that most people have never experienced, but to those of us fortunate enough to have enjoyed them, they are worth turning to again and again, the taste unlike anything else – at once sweet, savory, and delicious.

Our Background

Three years ago, we moved from a small closet-sized kitchen in Sedona to Scottsdale Arizona to follow a dream of opening our own full size restaurant. Although the relocation was painful and expensive, our journey have been amazing. People have been asking us to open other locations in different parts of the metro area, but we were not ready for the next step. Recently we were presented with the opportunity to buy an old U-Haul that we are transforming into a food truck, but we need your help to raise money to get the food truck running and bring some delicious Colombian Hot Dogs to the streets. 

The way we see it, food should always be an experience. After ten years in business, we know how to offer our customers experiences that are unique and unforgettable, and we can't wait to do that for an even larger audience through our hot dog food truck.

Where We are Currently

Having purchased an old U-Haul truck, we have already taken the first big step toward building Simon's Hot Dogs Food Truck into a winning brand. There is still much more work to go, though. This is only the beginning of our story, and to see it through to the end, we are turning to you for some additional support.

 

What We Need

Our goal through this campaign is to raise $25,000. $20,000 of those funds will cover the costs of  outfitting the food truck – paying for equipment and materials – while the other $5,000 will pay for the wrap and advertising.

                          \

Equipment needed:

Flat Top Grill

Range

Charbroiler

Fryer

Stainless Steel Work Table

Pre- area Refrigerator

Refrigerator

Three-Compartment Sink

Hand Sink

And we are working with a talented designer to assemble a cool vinyl wrap that reflects Simon's personality. 

 

What You Get

To raise the money for this project we have put together different catering packages you also will have the opportunity to get some awesome deals on discounted gift cards. We appreciate all of your support and in addition to our eternal love and gratitude for your generosity. We hope you take advantage of the savings and some of the once in a lifetime experiences we put together specially for you. (Check the list of perks on the right-side of the campaign page).

 

Risks & Challenges

There is minimum of risk to what we have planned because of the extensive experience and knowledge that we have amassed throughout our career in the food industry. Aside from the truck itself, none of this is new to us. We have been selling hot dogs for a decade, and whatever logistical challenges arise as we make our operation mobile, we will overcome them. We also promise to keep all my contributors updated regarding all the progress that we make, remaining transparent throughout this expansion.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Simon's Hot Dogs Food Truck by sharing a link to the campaign on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. Go ahead and let all your friends and family know that we are taking our hot dogs to the streets, and keep an eye out for the map and schedule that we release.

We are so grateful for your support.

Felipe, Marcela & Simon's Team

story:
THE SWEY STORY & IMPACT

 

First SWEY Tasting! - Brother & Sister Duo

 

 

Each serving of SWEY (16.9oz bottle) includes all of the benefits listed above! Along with these, SWEY is low calorie! Our products range from 5 - 15 calories per bottle. As Gen Z'ers, we are constantly creating and innovating, and seek for uniqueness. We've applied this same interest in SWEY with our unique flavors. 

Our flavors include

Citrus Sizzle: Orange & Tangerine

Major Kiwi: Strawberry & Kiwi

Tropicalada: Pineapple & Coconut

 

The SWEY Athlete

 

 

Launch Plan

We will be launching via eCommerce through Shopify. Website: sweytoplay.com

 

What We Need

 

 

After three years of building SWEY, we are so close to launching! And with that, comes your help:) The funds will be going directly towards making the drinks so that we can have them ready for you! You play a major role in this, and your help would mean everything! It started with a passion, and now SWEY has formed a mission. A mission to provide the leaders of today - Gen Z - better replenishment to continue to make their positive dent in the universe.

 

Website: sweytoplay.com

Instagram: @swey.to.play

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help with spreading the word! You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.

 

Risks & Challenges

Although we recognize that the beverage industry is competitive, we know that SWEY will create a whole new wave of Gen Z Products, where 40% of our consumer market lays. SWEY brings new momentum, an important value, and a fresh take on consumer products!

Citrus Sizzle: Orange & Tangerine
Major Kiwi: Strawberry & Kiwi
Tropicalada: Pineapple & Coconut The SWEY Athlete

 

 
Launch Plan
We will be launching via eCommerce through Shopify. Website: sweytoplay.com
 

What We Need
 

 
After three years of building SWEY, we are so close to launching! And with that, comes your help:) The funds will be going directly towards making the drinks so that we can have them ready for you! You play a major role in this, and your help would mean everything! It started with a passion, and now SWEY has formed a mission. A mission to provide the leaders of today - Gen Z - better replenishment to continue to make their positive dent in the universe.

 
Website: sweytoplay.com
Instagram: @swey.to.play
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Help with spreading the word! You can also use the Indiegogo share tools.
 
Risks & Challenges
Although we recognize that the beverage industry is competitive, we know that SWEY will create a whole new wave of Gen Z Products, where 40% of our consumer market lays. SWEY brings new momentum, an important value, and a fresh take on consumer products!

story:
FAQ

How do ¡Yappah! Crisps compare taste-wise vs. other snacks?

Taste comes first! That’s why we sent our chef on a mission to use carefully selected forgotten ingredients & rescue them to create a completely new type of snack. The results: a delicious snack with all the flavor nuance of a meal.

Are there similar products out there?

Some snacks may include chicken, others may include rescued ingredients -- but no others include both.

Where do you source your ingredients?

¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps help fight food waste by using safe and delicious ingredients that for a variety of reasons are surplus to their original requirements and would have otherwise been left behind if not included in ¡Yappah! Crisps.

What is the quality of your ingredients?

These are high-quality ingredients from reputable suppliers such as Tyson Foods and Molson Coors.

What is in the Protein Crisps?

  • Chicken Breast- #1 on our Ingredient Line  
  • Tapioca Flour- from Cassava root for a satisfying crunch
  • Rescued Vegetable Puree-  from juicing
  • Rescued Spent Grain- from beer brewing

What are the Protein Crisp Flavors?

  • From the Garden (Rescued Veggie Puree):
    • Chicken Carrot - Curry Flavored
    • Chicken Celery - Mojo Flavored
  • From the Brewery (Rescued Spent Grain):
    • Chicken IPA White Cheddar
    • Chicken - Shandy Beer Flavored

What is your brand / company about?

Up in the Andes, we were introduced to a tradition, on the verge of being forgotten, that made a big impact on us. It was the concept of “yapa,” and it refers to the little something extra a merchant gives to a valued customer, so that nothing gets wasted.

This concept inspired us. Because “Let’s waste food,” said no one. Ever. At Yappah Foods, we aim to Discover Beauty in the Forgotten™. Fighting food waste is just the beginning.

How does Tyson fit in?

¡Yappah! Crisps were created by the Tyson Innovation Lab. Tyson Innovation Lab is proud to be taking a lead role in finding an innovative way to get the public involved in reducing food waste. Tyson Innovation Lab is a specially-selected team charged with driving faster innovation, driving new growth and getting new products to market faster. In six months, the team works to design market launch ready products — this timing is 80 percent faster than traditional approaches with the goal of creating better products for humans.

What is Upcycled Chicken?

We use Tyson chicken breast tenders in ¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps. At times, the cutting process for the chicken breast tenders leaves a trim. We upcycle this chicken tender trim into ¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps to add value to an otherwise low-value trim. Once incorporated into the Protein Crisps, it adds flavor and protein.

What are rescued veggie purees?

Veggie purees are usually sold to make juice. The ones we are sourcing are close to their expiration date and would have been trashed if not given new life by being incorporated into ¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps. They are perfectly good in terms of quality and provide great flavor.

What is rescued spent grain?

These spent grains (malted barley) are a byproduct of the beer brewing process. They would have been used for non-human consumption or trashed if not provided to us.

Why package it in a can?

Aluminum cans are fully recyclable. In this way the product helps fight food waste on the inside while the can fights packaging waste on the outside.

Recycle right at home, the same as any other standard aluminum can. If your city recycles, you can recycle this packaging.

How do the ¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps help fight food waste?

¡YAPPAH! Protein Crisps help fight food waste by using safe and delicious ingredients that for a variety of reasons are surplus to their original requirements and would have otherwise been left behind.

Do ¡Yappah! Crisps expire?

Yes - as indicated on each individual can.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

hello@yappah.com

story:
Imagine a world where everyone would be able to cook vegan, delicious and healthy meals without the need to read through wordy recipe instructions - 

 

Hi there, 

We are the team of Speechless Cookbook, and we have created a visual cookbook that enables you to cook tasty vegan meals without reading long recipe descriptions.

With our cookbook, we want to take the intimidating out of cooking by replacing wordy descriptions with pictures, providing a more natural connection to the food while giving a child-like approach towards cooking.

By using symbols enriched by our beautiful design, we make it easy to enable everyone to cook delicious, nourishing, and vegan meals, even if they have never cooked before. 

Our goal is to enable everyone to prepare meals easily without getting lost in recipe descriptions and also to bring families, friends, or even strangers ( at a safe distance! ) together during the process. 

All we need now is your support :) 

 

 

Speechless Cookbook is a cookbook based on strong visual language and beautiful design, guiding the aspiring chef through the cooking process.

Our goal is to enable everyone, never mind if child, parent, colleague, friend, or grandma to cook delicious, vegan meals without the hassle of going through long and complicated recipe descriptions.

 

 

This is not the usual cookbook you’re looking at. In essence, Speechless Cookbook makes it easy to cook your future favorite meals, without reading one line of text.

Whether you are a parent, want to help your child learn to cook, or are just looking for a fun way to spend some time with someone close to you, Speechless Cookbook is an engaging way of getting started.

Speechless Cookbook makes it easy to cross-cultural borders, language borders, or to inspire your child or spouse to be your kitchen assistant.

Bring back the fun in your kitchen and enjoy healthy, plant-based meals that your whole family will love! 

 

 

 

The cookbook consists of 14 recipes and our symbol description, just in case you forgot how a ? (tomato) looks like. 

Each symbol has been carefully designed with its use in mind. Choose one of our recipes, and just get started on your next meal!

With Speechless Cookbook, it doesn't matter if you're an expert cook, or if you just started your journey into cooking: 

Anyone can cook! 

 

 


 

With Speechless Cookbook you will be able to:

  • Cook delicious meals in easy, visual steps without reading a single line of text
  • Surprise your children with a beautiful book full of recipes that are delicious, healthy, kid-friendly and also plant-based
  • Play a game of „Can you do it without saying a word?“ We both know this will be fun!
  • Enable anyone not speaking your language or unable to read, to be your 5-star chef!
  • Amaze anyone who doesn’t believe these recipes are plant-based!
  • Cook the best vegan Spaghetti Carbonara in town! (Pictures! We need pictures!)

 

 

 

 

Hendrikje Wagner: "Once I heard about Speechless Cookbook, I imagined it wasn't that practical, but it honestly changed my life! The recipes turned my picky 14-year-old son into an interested, part-time vegan, and he even offers to cook for the family now!"

Get in my tummy!

 

 


Jasmin Karatas: „With Speechless Cookbook, I had more fun in the kitchen, than with any other cookbook before! It’s so easy to use, and the recipes are easy to prepare and incredibly tasty!“ 

 

 

Think about a world where everyone, no matter what their knowledge about cooking, their origin, or their culture, would be able to cook plant-based, easy, and delicious meals!

We believe that plant-based is the future of nutrition, and we want to provide you with the most intuitive guide to cooking vegan meals. You'll recognize a ?  when you see one, and with this intuitive and visual approach, you'll be able to turn anyone into a chef!

During one of the ideation sessions of Myndset Cards, the idea of Speechless Cookbook has been enriched. Roland Lehle developed the idea during his graduation in communications design and added all the tips and tweaks Myndset Cards had to offer.

 

 

 

 Each Speechless Cookbook contains:

  • 14 Delicious recipes
     
  • Easy plant-based meals for everyone
     
  • Revolutionary new design for cookbooks
     
  • Fun and laughter in the kitchen 

 

You want to get started with Speechless Cookbook but lack the funds of getting your hands on our beautiful cookbook and want to get started right away? 

Get our printable digital version and get started already. 

We want you to love cooking!

 

 

Speechless Cookbook has been founded by Roland Lehle, Alex Holzreiter, Bene Matern, and Hendrikje Wagner, and they are a mixed team of experienced entrepreneurs and young designers with consulting, agency, and 24/7 Mompreneuer background.
