story:
Group

Short Summary

Ben Midulla, Founder and visionary entrepreneur, skilled at catching a trend and acting upon it before others, had an idea to create a company dedicated to producing a top quality, healthy, real energy-related drink for all. Based upon his values of innovation, excellence, boldness, long-term entrepreneurship, persistence, and as a steadfast supporter of the body's mitochondrial enhancement process, MITO-CHON 250mL The Energy Within, was created.

                      

THE ENERGY WITHIN itself is best described as a “Lift” followed by “Sustained Energy and Health,” as contrasted with the stimulant-based “energy drinks” providing a “Spike” followed by a “Crash” (so ineffective and a likely health concern).  Mito-Chon® is the only drink formulated to get real natural energy to the mitochondria.   We are striving for a market leadership position in the intense and overcrowded “energy drink” and sports supplement markets, tying our tag line THE ENERGY WITHIN to the mitochondria, the “Energy Engine of the Cell.”  Our goal is to deliver a truly REAL “health and natural energy drink” that is far superior to any other product on the market. How are bodies use Mito-Chon ingredients as compared to energy and sports drinks will allow Mito-Chon to be placed with energy drinks and in the Natural Foods departments of grocery stores. Mito-Chon delivers flavor and function with beneficial synergistic ingredients. Mito-Chon IS a life-force because the human body contains the source of energy creation in the mitochondria.  Once Mito-Chon accesses the 1000s of millions of mitochondria below the cells, their minuscule proton pumps start to produce ATP (adenosine triphosphate) the energy needed to exist.  Mito-Chon is the conduit to harness the energy with a cumulative effect to be drawn upon throughout the day when necessary.  What happens inside the body with Mito-Chon is not magic but scientific fact. When your mitochondria are running at 100%, energy will be produced to build up a reserve to be tapped into when necessary.  Increasing Your Mitochondria: Evidence shows that consistent exercise has a large impact on improving the health and quantity of cellular mitochondria. There is also mounting evidence that targeted nutrition plays a significant role in protecting these vital powerhouses.Check out these two short unsolicited testimonial videos - click on their names - they are really worth seeing. 

  Will Barker      Jamie Zarate 

WE STAND ALONE.

The mitochondria is central to research into human prehistory, genetic diseases, cell suicide, fertility, aging, bioenergetics, sex, and the eukaryotic cell. To understand how energy is created see this interesting 4 minute animated video below, The Way Energy is Made--Mighty Mitochondria Action!

Most of us take our mitochondria for granted.  Only the mitochondria is where real energy is produced. But what if you did not have enough mitochondria to live a normal life (take the recent media coverage of Charlie Gard)? MitoAction.org is a non-profit working on cures for Mito the disease caused by a deficiency of mitochondria, needed to live a normal life. The video above was made on their behalf. Mito-Chon USA Corp. Ben Midulla has participated in webinars put on by the founder of MitoAction RN Christy Barcal where people that have family or friends with Mito participated.  Listening to them talk about getting through the day because of their lack of natural energy creation really touched Mr. Midulla.    

Our task is to continually educate people about real energy production within the human body and about how with real energy comes real strength, real endurance, real performance, real recovery and real focus. It is about one product, like a heat seeking missile targeting every part of your body below the cellular level, where your mitochondria miniscule proton pumps create ATP (adenosine triphosphate) energy from the good foods you eat and Mito-Chon the energies needed to live. Accomplishing this broader task is the core of our long-term success.

GIVING BACK: While Mito-Chon cannot create more mitochondria, we believe Mito-Chon can however, provide more energy to the mitochondria that exists in those who have Mito.  I made a pledge to help: Mito-Chon USA Corp will donate Mito-Chon to anyone who has Mito and give a portion of our profits to MitoAction.org for ongoing research.  

IMPACT of Mito-Chon® 250mL

What are the standards of Mito-Chon, and is Mito-Chon unique in the market? Mito-Chon® is part of a gigantic market that generates tens of billions of dollars in revenue, which means there is a huge potential for financial gain.  Companies are making fortunes bottling vitamin water and selling overpriced coffee, while relentlessly exploiting social media for the purpose of convincing future customers into buying their products.  There are more natural and healthy products making it to the market as consumers are changing their buying habits to buy "clean and natural" and that is a good trend. The soft drink industry is slowly spiraling down losing billions a year and there is nothing on their horizon to stop the hemorrhaging.  Bai is the closest alternative and is a good choice for what it does and is a better and natural alternative to soft drinks.  With Mito-Chon 250mL we have a  drink that makes a positive unprecedented impact on all our lives and wellbeing in a dramatic positive way in an era where the nation's health is in freefall having taken a turn for the worse. This is our opportunity with You to correct a business that in some parts is deeply flawed, so we went after it and got it right with grit, perseverance, and patience. 

             OUR RECENT IMPACT: Houston Half Marathon, 10/29/17, 7am-9am             

 

 

Mito-Chon is not easy to duplicate: each process of integrating and formulating the ingredients in and of itself is not obvious. We set the highest of standards to design, develop, and produce a superior product, not another one with a lot of promises and no delivery. In fact, we define a new “Health and Energy Drink Market" and provide the education along with it so everyone can be informed as to where energy really comes from and the true meaning of The ENERGY WITHIN. 

 Who wants to live their lives one hour at a time on a highway with no exit, looking for a bull ring with a monster in it trying to be a rock star? 

The truth about Mito-Chon® lies in the results: keeping the body’s engines running at maximum capacity. Mito-Chon® is the ONLY product needed, a quality alternative which can eliminate a lot of costly supplements, especially those some feel they need for daily activities, or workouts. There are too many “energy" drinks, pills, powders, all tagged as different, but virtually the same.  Fillers with too many choices, look-a-likes, coming and going, getting nowhere going in circles like a merry-go-round—another product to get you pumped up with stimulants. Mito-Chon® is a straight path to a healthy natural energy solution and notably "feel good" sensory effect for anyone young and old, so "Come and Take Us" and feel and see the difference. And remember, life doesn’t come with directions. One bottle can be taken daily or two if you like. It’s all GOOD. End of story!

Your GOOD body will tell you: we are everything we say on our label and more. 

              

            

Pictured: Ben Midulla, Melanie Good, Melanie Good, Nick Midulla, Mel Brink, Mermaid Kim Turcotte, Jason Roben, Mike Cass, Mike Szymanski, Eugene Ofosu, Viviano & Ben, Nick & Ben Midulla 

What fans like YOU will help us achieve when you contribute:  Our contributors will make it possible for Mito-Chon® 250mL to be launched nationwide, indeed, worldwide, creating an awareness through education as to what real energy is, as we make Mito-Chon® a 21st Century brand and #1 non-stimulant healthy drink. Mito-Chon is a fan-based product, and when YOU join our other fans become the most powerful ad medium. Advocates will proudly represent the company, use Mito-Chon and sway others to do the same, not because of payment, but because they genuinely love Mito-Chon, understand its benefits, incorporate it into their daily activities and want their family and friends to love Mito-Chon as well.

We need contributors who can appreciate what Mito-Chon® brings for them and and how it helps to achieve being the very best, mentally and physically. We never manipulate, mislead or misrepresent what Mito-Chon® can do. We provide more than inspirational slogans or catch phrases; we provide a product that inspires, needing no further content of what it provides because it is clearly printed on our unique bottle and expanded upon on our website: www.mito-chonusa.com,  Read detailed information about every ingredient and some serious unsolicited TESTIMONIES, as well as FAQs we experienced since we first brought this product into America in mid 2016.  

Your contributions as new fans can be a powerful force in enabling us to realize the awesome potential of this technology and together build an even larger fan base, as everyone’s new favorite drink—Mito-Chon® 250mL—grows into a world class product, the purpose of our Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign.  We need your curiosity, your backing, your input on Mito-Chon®. We need YOU as fans and with your help, someday soon, you can say, “I was there when it all began and helped make it happen." Come and Take Us.  Together, we are Mito-Chon®. 

What we Need and What You Get:  We need $150,000 to produce 250,000 Mito-Chon filled 250mL bottles. Our red bottles are unique, eye catching, expensive, aluminum; they identify Mito-Chon's statement of quality.  Anything less than $150,000 would drive the costs of our bottles up. We do not use cheap plastic bottles to reduce the cost of Mito-Chon, plus our recyclable red aluminum bottles are lined inside to protect the ingredients.  

When we reach a weekly production run of 1 million bottles, our bottler in France, Ardagh Group, will install a line for our bottles in their Montreal plant, thus saving overseas shipping costs when we are ready for total production in North America. Price breaks are at 500k and 1M bottles.  Materials: ingredients, bottles (screen printed labels); Formulation, blending, production: bottling, packing, shipping, distribution, product liability insurance. Our Excel Spreadsheet details everything, so we know where the money goes. It is the only way we could have made it this far. We are very hands-on and do not depend upon brokers when it comes to securing pricing for anything.  Mito-Chon® 250mL was a great help on those long days and nights.  Help us reach our production goal and YOU will get 25% off MSRP.

Stretch Goals - more money, better results: Should we exceed funding we have Stretch Goals.  Our 1st Stretch Goal will be another $150,000 which will allow us to produce 500,000 Mito-Chon filled 250mL bottles. If we meet our 1st Stretch goal, our 2nd Stretch Goal is another $150,000 to produce 1,000,000 Mito-Chon filled 250mL bottles. The more bottles we are able to order the greater price reduction we get. Details with all costs, expenses, marketing are all- inclusive for every stage including co-packing.

THE PERK - THE BOTTLE - THE PROMISE - THE SOLUTION - 

   

If we don’t reach Stage I goal we will order a minimum quantity of bottles and ingredients, etc. only for our contributors.    ​

Mito-Chon’s 60-day campaign added incentive: Early fans will receive as many as 6      bonus bottles of Mito-Chon shipped within days of their contribution in addition to the Perks they receive.  All fans making contributions for Perks within the first 30 days will receive additional Perks of his or her choice of apparel IF they recommend Mito-Chon to a friend or family member and that person makes their contribution for Perks before our 60-day campaign ends. 

Each Fan contributing in the first 30 days will receive a Referral ID to give to the parties he or she tells about Mito-Chon’s Indiegogo Campaign.  If that party becomes a fan/contributor within the 60-day campaign period, you will get a reward notice when the campaign ends.  The reward will be more Mito-Chon 250mL or a Mito-Chon Come and Take Us sports shirt in his or her size.

What we accomplish with Mito-Chon fan contributions:  Mito-Chon will begin to redefine the perception of how energy is created in the body, where it comes from and how it gets to the sub-cellular mitochondria, where it is processed into real usable ATP energy without side effects, not stimulants that do not last or could be harmful.

We want YOU to be a part of the process for your own health while sharing the message of our campaign with your friends and family. Our goal is to create an awakening movement and make Mito-Chon mainstream, keeping it there, and changing the conversation among active people and athletes that there IS a better, healthier, great tasting drink that delivers flavor and function to assist all of our bodies in liberating their own energy by feeding the mitochondria with natural healthy ingredients, all found in Mito-Chon 250mL.  And what fan/contributor would not want that?  

Entrepreneurial Qualifications of the Founder. In the 80s and 90s, Ben Midulla founded two companies and raised alone in excess of $3 million from private investors that pioneered the development of then leading-edge technologies in the communications industry when the Internet was not a commercial reality, nor were there many satellites. The challenges were overwhelming because we were creating part of the requirements for modern-day communications. These technologies helped launch our communications as we know them today. The first was a proprietary forward error correcting coding (FEC) technology to correct errors in digital data transmissions which led to a Very Large Scale Integrated (VLSI) chip designed for both commercial, industrial and U.S. military applications. Without FEC, digital data could not be sent from one transmission point to another without errors.  We would never have been able to send a man to the moon without mapping using digital data.  Based upon our FEC technology we were to secure an SBIR Phase I $49,368 and Phase II $500,000 DoD Contracts.  We were only one of three SBIR Phase II awards in the state of Texas that year.  Working with Dr. Wm. W. Wu, former Chief of the Executive Organ at Intelsat in Washington, D.C., leading to the development of ATM FEC technology which provided immediate value-added operating performance in personal, industrial and military computers while being fully compatible with the operating requirements of computer networking ATM technology.  AT&T paid $1 billion dollars for an ATM development company in Bethesda, MD. Our ATM FEC technology was valued at 10% of what that company received from AT&T.

Building the Mito-Chon brand.  Mito-Chon changes the diametric of the energy and sports drink industry because we are NOT THEM.  It is no surprise that Mito-Chon is a “million dollar idea” that has attracted popular companies with not so popular ethics. Mito-Chon is not a sell-out and has been in the testing and pre-marketing phase for three years to ensure that it is the perfection of a clean supplement. Our fans became fans of Mito-Chon because they like themselves.  

We do not make our product with inferior cheap, unpleasant tasting ingredients, loaded with added sugars, synthetics, dyes, proprietary blends, warning labels and side effects just to become more profitable. Together we will alert the misinformed or uninformed that there is Mito-Chon 250mL, good for anyone, young and old, to help them feel more optimistic, fight panic, depression, and all the spin brought about in part by hype, fast highs/crashes associated with current energy drinks. Mito-Chon zeros in on the truth about what’s good for YOU.  It is our story, not just our product.  Our product is the story,  

    Risks and challenges are to be expected and part of the entrepreneurial life when anyone is developing leading-edge technologies. But the challenge of Mito-Chon®, designed to create the first and best real mitochondrial enhancement drink, presented quite a few unusual circumstances. It all began in 2012, when I was told about a 25mL drink with 8 ingredients developed in Davos, Switzerland, by a pharmacist with a bio-chemical degree, originally intended for his daughter studying for her doctorate and tired all the time.   

    The gentleman who told me about this product was involved with me in an unrelated business but he passed along some test results that sounded interesting, and I agreed to try some, so when I met with him in Vienna, Austria he gave me 200 25mL sample shots.  I took 2 in Vienna, one before working out in a gym named McFit and another the next morning before a long return flight to Houston.  I loved the results and knew I wanted to market this product in the USA but first wanted my friends in Houston to try it. They all liked it a lot and by December 2012 we were all convinced this could be a great product that we could build a game-changing company around to challenge the so-called energy and sport drinks industry.    

     25mL shot (Dec. 2012)   

    Due to other unrelated business commitments, I wasn’t ready to move on developing this 25mL shot until Oct. 2013. I then went to Davos, Switzerland to present my offer to bring the product into the USA under my terms. The pharmacist and I could not come to an agreement because he wanted me to pay a retail price of $4.50/bottle for 10,000 25ml bottles. No way would I agree to those terms.  I was willing to cover all manufacturing costs up front and split the profits 50/50 after all expenses, but he did not want that. Some months later after further failed negotiations, I decided with two colleagues to create a formula of our own using the same critical ingredients as a base with 8 more ingredients that would increase the body's mitochondrial cellular activity. Having read several papers by Sepp Porta PhD. on the qualities of magnesium and elderberry, we were close to making the final ingredient selection. We wanted a taste that no one would ever forget, smooth and clean. It came from the elderberry flower, which also is where the good-for-you natural sugar comes from.  Elderberry has the added benefit of converting adenosine triphosphate (ATP) to ADP faster, a real plus to creating mitochondrial liberation of real energy. The end result is a super-great selection of ingredients for our new 250mL drink, I named and trademarked, Mito-Chon®,   See our Ingredients section on our website http://www.mito-chonusa.com and read why the only sugar in Mito-Chon is natural and comes from the elderberry.

      Mito-Chon 250mL (2015) 

    We had to locate all the high-quality ingredients from reputable companies in the USA, Germany and Austria along with Certificates of Analysis, use a formulator in  Vienna, Austria, secure 250mL bottles and bottler and create and print labels for our pre-production run and turn it all over to our co-packer APO Fruchtsafte GmbH in Millstatt See, Austria.  All U.S. Customs details were arranged for the 1st shipment Jul. 2015 (238 cases, 24 bottles/case; 1,488 bottles) air shipped to Houston for initial test market sampling, and then a 2nd shipment Jan 2016 (4,224 bottles). Results were super positive, even though the 1st shipment July 2015 was detained by the FDA so we could comply with their minor label changes, which took us only a matter of days to correct but 4 months for their approval. We can now say that our label was finally approved  in writing by the FDA’s Center for Food Safety and Nutrition.  

        

    Pictured: 1st Mito-Chon shipment (1,488 bottles) July 2015, at Houston IAH​:  Ron Moore, Special Agent in Charge, DHS (Ret.) & Richard D. Meador, (foreground). 

    The 3rd shipment July 2016 (14,787 bottles, 616 cases) made a total of 20,499 bottles for all three shipments, which led to our successful test sampling and selling in Houston grocery stores (Kroger) and three samplings at a Houston 24 Hour Fitness gym.

    PICTURED AT KROGER SAMPLING: Adriana Lolo, Houston Kroger store manager & Ben Midulla; Gregory Grinblat & Ben; Mickey & Margaret Manos; Jamie Zarate & Mike Szymanski; and Houston Police Dept. officers.

       

      

    Kroger is the first grocery store chain ever to sell Mito-Chon in the USA at a promotional price of $3.00 per bottle, or $3.99 without a Kroger Card.  It was a very successful weekend test sampling/selling event as 33 cases were sold in one month with no advertising. Before we can sell on a regional or national basis to Kroger, we must purchase product liability insurance ($35k/yr). We know our final costs to produce Mito-Chon in Austria plus all steps leading to production and shipping. We have dealt with stabilizing our ingredients, correcting our label, triple checking that our shipments would not be mishandled, and dealing with U.S. Customs and Brokers. I could not have done it without drinking Mito-Chon every day and surrounding myself with a committed team. 

    1st Mito-Chon Group Marketing Meeting 2-27-16                                    

    Key Members:  (L\R) Ron Moore, DHS; Coleman Tucker, Corp. Atty/Cycling; Dick Meador, Andrew George, PRC VP; Ben Midulla, CEO; Jamie Zarate, Marketing; Trent Vann, Houston Fire Dept; and Mike Cass, Houston Police Dept., Homicide.

    Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving manufacturing challenges: Based upon our first production experience in Austria with APO GmbH in Millsatt See, Austria the co-packer and a local Austrian formulator, we anticipate no issues with our next production run.  However, the building of a major brand requires a co-packer with International connections and very high volume capacity already on their locations.  Working through the Austrian Trade Commission  Starzinger was recommended to Mito-Chon.  This led to a series of conversations after confidentially agreements with Starzinger's head of production.  Starzinger has the bottling equipment for maxi pull top bottles and have worked together before with Ardagh Group in France our bottle manufacturer.  Starzinger has international know-how and years of co-packing experience enabling the company to be the ideal co-packer for Mito-Chon. State-of-the-art filling technology and the expert knowledge in all areas such as material, packaging or transport are what makes Starzinger one of the most competent and successful bottlers in the industry. Total reliability, an excellent price/performance ratio and maximum flexibility ensure individual attention to customers’ requirements. Customer support comes directly from the upper management level.     

    In the future, depending upon our sales volumes we will give consideration to bottling in the USA with a co-packer to be determined.  Under this scenario and based upon high bottling purchasing volumes, Ardagh has a bottling manufacturing facility in Montreal but do not currently run our designed bottles at that location; however their managing director in France assured us that once we reach 1 M bottles per week, they will install a dedicated line for our bottles in Montreal thus saving overseas shipping freight costs. 

    Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving distribution challenges:  Kroger has their own distribution centers as do all other big box grocery chains, but we have to first get Mito-Chon there. The same goes for Europa Nutrition with seven distribution centers, as does Bodybuilding.com Vitamin Shop, GNC.  We use Priority Worldwide Services (PWS) for international shipping, US Customs clearing and disbursement. PWS is a full service logistics provider operating around the globe. PWS operates strategically placed distribution facilities, 24/7, throughout the US and in key markets worldwide. PWS' US facilities are fully Customs Bonded and allow data to be linked between all offices, available for customers, obtainable directly from their website. PWS' facilities in the Port of Baltimore, MD. house the appropriate equipment and staff to handle major distributions/product roll-outs. PWS’ Warehousing Solutions attest to their flexibility and responsiveness to any situation.  PWS can break down full containers and ship them down to one case if need be to our buyers'  distribution or retail locations.   Mito-Chon wants to concentrate on our core business and need a reliable business partner to handle our distribution details. PWS is our solution.

    Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving marketing challenges: It is the intent of the founder to build Mito-Chon 250mL into a billion-dollar brand within four years.  To make this happen the founder will invite a food and beverage investment partner with direct experience selling in the food and beverage industry, a partner preferably who sees billions of dollars of products that aren’t all that healthy for consumers and has been on mission to challenge what’s sold on those store shelves and has been successful in the food and beverage market. 

    We know the challenges we face to alter, then change people’s perception of how energy is created and we have just that product in Mito-Chon 250mL and have been successful on a limited basis one-to-one, but we need to take that message nationwide, indeed worldwide.  It could be a sports celebrity who brings that message and/or an up and coming competitor in his sport.

    We need a partner who shares our vision for bringing a disruptive product to these markets. We have the great product, great packaging,  great image and our passion runs deep. 

    Mito-Chon’s Plan for individual markets; sports, trucking, and high stress professions: Examples. We have had successful samplings with long haul truckers, the backbone of our distribution network worldwide. Truckers take energy drinks like water, but the majority want something better because they know there will be a crash and burn. We currently have some truckers using Mito-Chon,  Recently we have sampled Mito-Chon with nurses and floor personnel in St. Luke's Hospital in the Houston Medical Center on two floors. For a long day or night working under stress there is nothing better than Mito-Chon.  A few ER doctors are taking Mito-Chon and love it. In October 2-17 the Company co-sponsored a Half-Marathon team of 8 runners in the Houston Half Marathon and 5K run.  All their times were lowered. 

    Cycling as in Tour de France and Ride Across America, running in marathons and ultra-marathons, Ironman and competitive CrossFit are brutal on the competitors. Each sport or profession benefits from using Mito-Chon, the key is how we reach reach out to these markets. We believe each market is unique and we have that plan to reach each market without just throwing money at advertising and hope it sticks.

    The burn rate in beverages is high so under capitalization is not acceptable. We need to prove ourselves regionally before nationally, so any marketing errors can be corrected. LA and Houston are ideal cities, Houston because of it's diversity, which is detailed in our Why Houston, Why Us, Why Now presentation available upon request.   

    What makes Mito-Chon stand out against all other energy drinks and sports drinks that gives us the ammunition to challenge those markets?  Here are some good reasons Mito-Chon is in a class of its own when it comes to a stimulating healthy beverage.

    • It energizes you without mega doses of caffeine (20mg in Mito-Chon).
    • It has an unmatched flavor that will win you over from the first sip. It's lightly carbonated and very refreshing. No stomach discomfort or acidity issues have been recorded to date.
    • It’s good quality clean burning fuel (bio-energy), not to mention it spreads awareness and education to those that have been misguided by popular energy drink marketing scams.
    • Its ability to help with overall mood and dial in the all-important mind-muscle connection during exercise. 
    • Its recovery properties are unlike any other beverage in its class as well as added immune support.
    • It has beneficial anti-aging properties that are not found in other products. Mito-Chon has been mistaken for the "fountain of youth" or "liquid gold" more than once.  Just look at those who take it.
    • It's safe for all ages. Mito-Chon is safe for those who suffer from various conditions such as hypertension, heart disease, and cardiac dysrhythmia. There's no surge in respirations, heart rate, blood pressure, or blood glucose (25g carbs in Mito-Chon)

    In summary, when considering the price per serving just imagine a trip to Whole Foods to pick up the Mito-Chon ingredient list. You'd walk away with a hole in your pocket and the absorption of the supplements would be minimal. Our advanced stabilization formalization process delivers micronized nutrients direct to you without waste. You can take all the supplements you want, but if you aren't absorbing them properly you're wasting your money.

    Once funded and with Mito-Chon 250mLproduction run in hand  we will will make formal presentations to Kroger Co. and 24 Hour Fitness, both at their corp. headquarters. Both presentations are in Power Point and available upon request to qualified Parties.  With Kroger, it will be their Natural Foods Division.  We have a direct connection with the Head Nutritionist for Kroger in the Houston market, Braulio Garcia, who also co-manages one of Kroger’s over $1 M per week stores in Houston which by coincidence is the Kroger where the founder shops. Braulio was the first to introduce Kroger’s Natural Food department to the Houston market. Braulio has been taking Mito-Chon since July 2015 and is a diabetic.  His Testimony at http://www.mito-chonusa.com is a must read, especially if you are a diabetic. Braulio will also consult with Mito-Chon USA Corp. as a nutritionist, and will make, along with the founder the formal introduction of Mito-Chon to Kroger Natrual Foods Division and to athletic programs at universities in Texas by introducing Mito-Chon directly to their nutritionists (the key to gaining acceptance for any product used by athletes in any NCAA sports). There were discussions in April 2016 on about putting Mito-Chon into certain Kroger locations in Houston , Texas  and vicinity Kroger stores as a start. Once sales accelerate Mito-Chon could be in all of Region 2 of Kroger's 12 regions nationally; Kroger could expand Mito-Chon into other Divisions as they deem warranted based upon sales and Mito-Chon USA Corp. meeting all their requirements.  Mito-Chon’s goal with Kroger is to go nationwide and for our red bottle to be featured on the cover of their bi-monthly nutrition magazine (Live Naturally) with a feature story inside.  To ensure product visibility, free-standing portable coolers manufactured in Austin, TX will be supplied to feature/display Mito-Chon.  Similar free-standing portable coolers will be used in 24 Hour Fitness and other gyms whose contracts with other vendors control what goes into their coolers.

      Braulio Garcia, Nutritionist Consultant

    Regarding other gym chains and CrossFit, we will introduce Mito-Chon at their National Headquarters, while immediately concentrating on boutique operations.  There are over 600 locations nationwide of these combined facilities charging an average of $35/hr. Equinox with 94 gyms nationwide, is 1 part of 6 high dollar gym chains. Equinox charges over $250/mo. in Houston. We have an immediate large market base regionally in Houston because many of these boutique operations and Equinox have facilities in Houston. CrossFit has 21 Houston area boxes.  Any other big box distribution centers, including Amazon, GNC, The Vitamin Shoppe, Europa Nutrition, bodybuilding.com, we will reach out to them through the already established relationships our partner to-be may have or on our own,       

    We have the only mitochondrial enhancement drink with a proprietary technology which is literally impossible to duplicate.  It’s not just our ingredients, it’s the way they are stabilized, making Mito-Chon 250mL the very best synergistic healthy drink like no other.

    Dr. Rick Bellamy, Chiropractor; Jamie Zarate, Sales; Jason Roben, Special Projects Mgr. & Sales; and Ben Midulla, Founder.

              

    Ben Midulla is also a founder and majority owner of Petradyne Research Corp. (PRC), (www.petradyne.com) , a Systems of Award Management (SAM) contractor, qualified to make presentations to Department of Defense (DOD), DHS and Veterans Market.  Mito-Chon® is ideal for the USA military deployed in combat missions. Mito-Chon through PRC will make presentations to the US Army Rapid Equipping Agency and Dahlgren Navy Research Labs for sole source contracts. PRC has direct contacts in these Federal Agencies from previous demonstrations of its non-lethal technologies to these agencies.  

    Other Ways You Can Help  

    We realize some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help.You can help us spread the word and talk about our campaign by just emailing your friends and social media contacts. Also, use the Indiegogo share tools that you can find on our campaign and make sure to leave your name and we will help YOU for helping us.  We need people who view our campaign and feel they can contribute in other ways. We want to hear from you so email b.midulla@mito-chonusa.com .   

    MITO-CHON FAQ

    What is Mito-Chon?

    Mito-Chon is a 250mL drink. It is in a new category unlike anything ever sold before. It does not create energy, it harnesses the essence of energy created within the body by the natural process of the energy engine performance of the mitochondria.

     

    Who created it?

    Ben Midulla, Dr. Rick Bellamy, Dick Meador, with special acknowledgement to Hans-Peter Strobel (Switzerland) and Dr. Seppe Porta (Austria).

     

    Why should we use it?

    Mito-Chon is our #1 life-enhancing, great tasting, clean formulation of all-natural beneficial ingredients that liberate the ENERGY WITHIN, your body's KEY to better health/feeling younger/performing better.

     

    Is Mito-Chon a pre-workout?

    No, it is not. Pre-workouts jack you up and then bring you down. Mito-Chon is more than that, it can be taken before, during or after. It is truly a game changer, in a class by itself, a complete all-in-one package that uniquely and naturally liberates the true energy within our bodies create through cell regeneration and the stimulation of ATP production.

     

    Is Mito-Chon just for athletes?

    NO. Mito-Chon is for any person who works under stress for long hours and needs more real energy which only comes from the good foods we eat and some supplements. If you work long hours knowing you must be focused and have real energy within you to overcome exhaustion, then Mito-Chon is for you. And Rock Stars love Mito-Chon.

     

    Why is there only one product?

    We don’t want to confuse YOU with choices of colors, flavors, etc. We don’t make separate products for pre-during-post-recovery. Just one product, Mito-Chon, one great taste--more than enough and your wallet will thank you. Should we come out with another product it will be built on the underpinning of Mito-Chon 250mL; and might just be a little quicker in getting to the mitochondria; but that’s the next chapter.

     

    What is the mitochondria?

    The human body is made up of about a hundred trillion cells and every one of those cells need energy to fuel and perform its individual functions from moving to thinking to breathing.  And that energy comes from the mito-chondria, the tiny "power plants" or tiny cellular “factories” that turn nutrients (food) into a chemical form of energy known as ATP (adenosine triphosphate). The mitochondria make the ATP from our food by a chemical process similar to the internal combustion in a car engine; instead of using gas and oxygen to release energy, food and oxygen is used (source Nick Lane’s book Oxygen). Muscle tissue is filled with mitochondria, and the more you have, the more energy your body produces; the mitochondria are the only place inside your body that can burn fat; the more muscle you have, the more fat you can burn. This is one of the reasons athletes and active individuals tend to be leaner.

     

    How is Mito-Chon different from some energy/sports drinks?

    What Mito-Chon® 250mL manifests is the evolution of the primitive concept of an "energy drink", which offers only a temporary experience, into the concept of a "life-enhancing formula", based on a deeper understanding of where real energy comes from. Mito-Chon is a clean technology that works with the body to enhance life fundamentally.

     

    What are the active ingredients in Mito-Chon?

    Only the finest natural ingredients, no synthetics (see list on website). As to Caffeine, we added a small amount of natural caffeine from the bean because there is evidence it can help in small amounts in central nervous system activity. It also affects adenosine receptors in the thalamus and enhances the synergistic effects of the other ingredients of Mito-Chon.

     

    Why is sugar in Mito-Chon?

    There is sugar and then there is sugar—sound confusing?  The only sugar in Mito-Chon is the good natural sugar from the Elderberry berry and flower —there are no added sugars, synthetics or stevia extract that may cause mild side effects such as nausea or stomach discomfort in some people. Erythritol, a sugar alcohol have a laxative effect, causing bloating, intestinal gas and diarrhea.  http://www.mito-chonusa.com/ingredients

    Will I experience any side-effects?

    No side effects, other than feeling good, with improved strength, performance, endurance, recovery, focus, etc.

    What are the directions for use and the shelf life of Mito-Chon?

    Life doesn't come with directions.  Take one bottle daily or two if you like. It’s all good. End of story.

    And 2 years shelf life on production bottles.

     

    Who makes Mito-Chon and where is Mito-Chon made?

    Our first trail production run was in Austria, bottled by APO Fruchtsäfte GmbH in Millstatt, AM, See, Austria. Depending upon the success of this campaign we will use Starzinger in Austria one of the biggest bottlers in Europe as our co-packer. 

    Why are bonus perk bottles being offered?

     

     

    We don’t want YOU to wait until late January 2018, and by getting samples now we hope it will encourage you to tell everyone you know how good Mito-Chon tastes and how good it is for YOU. Also, tell everyone YOU know to join you as a new fan/contributor of Mito-Chon. The reason for this immediate shipment of 1 to 6 Mito-Chon 250mL bottles from our 1st trial production run* offered in this Indiegogo Campaign.

    Where can we buy it?

    Indiegogo campaign and from website: www.mito-chonusa.com.

    What do we get when we order?

    An immediate shipment of 1 to 6 Mito-Chon 250mL bottles from our 1st trial production run.

     

    JUST FOR YOU!

    As an added Perk for every one of our contributors that purchases at least one case during this campaign you will receive a code so that you can     purchase up to two cases of Mito-Chon per month at $66 per case for yourself and your direct family for one year.

    PRODUCT FEATURES

    What is the bottle made from?

    Lined aluminum bottle by Ardagh Group in France, who also makes bottles for Coca-Cola and Red Bull.

    What colors do you offer?

    Red only with the elderberry flower on the pull off top.

    What sizes do you offer?

    250mL

    Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?

    Mito-Chon is made with you in mind. The bottle fits nicely in your hand and the maxi pull off top can be reapplied. 

    Bottle features?

    The Mito-Chon bottle grabs anyone’s attention.

    What are the recommend ages?

    While there are no restrictions on age we would suggest 16+ and must be in good health. Parents should understand the ingredients and consult with their pediatribtion if they feel it necessary. A lot of young athletes are taking energy drinks with high levels of caffeine and other synthetic ingredients. Not good. 

    Where can I use it?

    Everywhere you go!

    Is it safe?

    Yes. All 16 ingredients can be bought separately in stores.

    Are there any risks associated with use?

    Our research and extensive vetting has shown Mito-Chon and its properties to be of little risk. No warning labels are required.

    SHIPPING

    When does shipping begin?

    Late January 2018

    When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?

    FedEx Ground for N. America. Arrival 1-3 days but largely dependent on where you live.  

    Where does it ship?

    Globally

    How much is shipping?

    A case is 16 lbs. Cost is approx. $20 in the USA

    Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

    Not in North America

    CUSTOMER SERVICE

    What is your refund policy?

    We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.           

    What is your return / exchange policy?

    If you received your product and you  aren't satisfied, give or sell it to someone else. But, if you do have any issue, let us know and we will take care of it.

    How can I check the status of my pre-order?

    By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information. We update periodically.

    How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?

    Email Mito-Chon via your Indiegogo account and a customer service representative will assist you

    If I have other questions, who should I contact?

    b.midulla@mito-chonusa.com
story_txt:
Group

Short Summary
Ben Midulla, Founder and visionary entrepreneur, skilled at catching a trend and acting upon it before others, had an idea to create a company dedicated to producing a top quality, healthy, real energy-related drink for all. Based upon his values of innovation, excellence, boldness, long-term entrepreneurship, persistence, and as a steadfast supporter of the body's mitochondrial enhancement process, MITO-CHON 250mL The Energy Within, was created.
                      
THE ENERGY WITHIN itself is best described as a “Lift” followed by “Sustained Energy and Health,” as contrasted with the stimulant-based “energy drinks” providing a “Spike” followed by a “Crash” (so ineffective and a likely health concern).  Mito-Chon® is the only drink formulated to get real natural energy to the mitochondria.   We are striving for a market leadership position in the intense and overcrowded “energy drink” and sports supplement markets, tying our tag line THE ENERGY WITHIN to the mitochondria, the “Energy Engine of the Cell.”  Our goal is to deliver a truly REAL “health and natural energy drink” that is far superior to any other product on the market. How are bodies use Mito-Chon ingredients as compared to energy and sports drinks will allow Mito-Chon to be placed with energy drinks and in the Natural Foods departments of grocery stores. Mito-Chon delivers flavor and function with beneficial synergistic ingredients. Mito-Chon IS a life-force because the human body contains the source of energy creation in the mitochondria.  Once Mito-Chon accesses the 1000s of millions of mitochondria below the cells, their minuscule proton pumps start to produce ATP (adenosine triphosphate) the energy needed to exist.  Mito-Chon is the conduit to harness the energy with a cumulative effect to be drawn upon throughout the day when necessary.  What happens inside the body with Mito-Chon is not magic but scientific fact. When your mitochondria are running at 100%, energy will be produced to build up a reserve to be tapped into when necessary.  Increasing Your Mitochondria: Evidence shows that consistent exercise has a large impact on improving the health and quantity of cellular mitochondria. There is also mounting evidence that targeted nutrition plays a significant role in protecting these vital powerhouses.Check out these two short unsolicited testimonial videos - click on their names - they are really worth seeing. 
  Will Barker      Jamie Zarate 
WE STAND ALONE.
The mitochondria is central to research into human prehistory, genetic diseases, cell suicide, fertility, aging, bioenergetics, sex, and the eukaryotic cell. To understand how energy is created see this interesting 4 minute animated video below, The Way Energy is Made--Mighty Mitochondria Action!

Most of us take our mitochondria for granted.  Only the mitochondria is where real energy is produced. But what if you did not have enough mitochondria to live a normal life (take the recent media coverage of Charlie Gard)? MitoAction.org is a non-profit working on cures for Mito the disease caused by a deficiency of mitochondria, needed to live a normal life. The video above was made on their behalf. Mito-Chon USA Corp. Ben Midulla has participated in webinars put on by the founder of MitoAction RN Christy Barcal where people that have family or friends with Mito participated.  Listening to them talk about getting through the day because of their lack of natural energy creation really touched Mr. Midulla.    
Our task is to continually educate people about real energy production within the human body and about how with real energy comes real strength, real endurance, real performance, real recovery and real focus. It is about one product, like a heat seeking missile targeting every part of your body below the cellular level, where your mitochondria miniscule proton pumps create ATP (adenosine triphosphate) energy from the good foods you eat and Mito-Chon the energies needed to live. Accomplishing this broader task is the core of our long-term success.
GIVING BACK: While Mito-Chon cannot create more mitochondria, we believe Mito-Chon can however, provide more energy to the mitochondria that exists in those who have Mito.  I made a pledge to help: Mito-Chon USA Corp will donate Mito-Chon to anyone who has Mito and give a portion of our profits to MitoAction.org for ongoing research.  
IMPACT of Mito-Chon® 250mL
What are the standards of Mito-Chon, and is Mito-Chon unique in the market? Mito-Chon® is part of a gigantic market that generates tens of billions of dollars in revenue, which means there is a huge potential for financial gain.  Companies are making fortunes bottling vitamin water and selling overpriced coffee, while relentlessly exploiting social media for the purpose of convincing future customers into buying their products.  There are more natural and healthy products making it to the market as consumers are changing their buying habits to buy "clean and natural" and that is a good trend. The soft drink industry is slowly spiraling down losing billions a year and there is nothing on their horizon to stop the hemorrhaging.  Bai is the closest alternative and is a good choice for what it does and is a better and natural alternative to soft drinks.  With Mito-Chon 250mL we have a  drink that makes a positive unprecedented impact on all our lives and wellbeing in a dramatic positive way in an era where the nation's health is in freefall having taken a turn for the worse. This is our opportunity with You to correct a business that in some parts is deeply flawed, so we went after it and got it right with grit, perseverance, and patience. 
             OUR RECENT IMPACT: Houston Half Marathon, 10/29/17, 7am-9am             
 
 
Mito-Chon is not easy to duplicate: each process of integrating and formulating the ingredients in and of itself is not obvious. Entrepreneurial Qualifications of the Founder. In the 80s and 90s, Ben Midulla founded two companies and raised alone in excess of $3 million from private investors that pioneered the development of then leading-edge technologies in the communications industry when the Internet was not a commercial reality, nor were there many satellites. Risks and challenges are to be expected and part of the entrepreneurial life when anyone is developing leading-edge technologies. But the challenge of Mito-Chon®, designed to create the first and best real mitochondrial enhancement drink, presented quite a few unusual circumstances. It all began in 2012, when I was told about a 25mL drink with 8 ingredients developed in Davos, Switzerland, by a pharmacist with a bio-chemical degree, originally intended for his daughter studying for her doctorate and tired all the time.   
The gentleman who told me about this product was involved with me in an unrelated business but he passed along some test results that sounded interesting, and I agreed to try some, so when I met with him in Vienna, Austria he gave me 200 25mL sample shots.  I took 2 in Vienna, one before working out in a gym named McFit and another the next morning before a long return flight to Houston.  I loved the results and knew I wanted to market this product in the USA but first wanted my friends in Houston to try it. They all liked it a lot and by December 2012 we were all convinced this could be a great product that we could build a game-changing company around to challenge the so-called energy and sport drinks industry.    
 25mL shot (Dec. 2012)   
Due to other unrelated business commitments, I wasn’t ready to move on developing this 25mL shot until Oct. 2013. I then went to Davos, Switzerland to present my offer to bring the product into the USA under my terms. The pharmacist and I could not come to an agreement because he wanted me to pay a retail price of $4.50/bottle for 10,000 25ml bottles. No way would I agree to those terms.  I was willing to cover all manufacturing costs up front and split the profits 50/50 after all expenses, but he did not want that. Some months later after further failed negotiations, I decided with two colleagues to create a formula of our own using the same critical ingredients as a base with 8 more ingredients that would increase the body's mitochondrial cellular activity. Having read several papers by Sepp Porta PhD. on the qualities of magnesium and elderberry, we were close to making the final ingredient selection. We wanted a taste that no one would ever forget, smooth and clean. It came from the elderberry flower, which also is where the good-for-you natural sugar comes from.  Elderberry has the added benefit of converting adenosine triphosphate (ATP) to ADP faster, a real plus to creating mitochondrial liberation of real energy. The end result is a super-great selection of ingredients for our new 250mL drink, I named and trademarked, Mito-Chon®,   See our Ingredients section on our website http://www.mito-chonusa.com and read why the only sugar in Mito-Chon is natural and comes from the elderberry.
  Mito-Chon 250mL (2015)  
We had to locate all the high-quality ingredients from reputable companies in the USA, Germany and Austria along with Certificates of Analysis, use a formulator in  Vienna, Austria, secure 250mL bottles and bottler and create and print labels for our pre-production run and turn it all over to our co-packer APO Fruchtsafte GmbH in Millstatt See, Austria.  All U.S. Customs details were arranged for the 1st shipment Jul. 2015 (238 cases, 24 bottles/case; 1,488 bottles) air shipped to Houston for initial test market sampling, and then a 2nd shipment Jan 2016 (4,224 bottles). Results were super positive, even though the 1st shipment July 2015 was detained by the FDA so we could comply with their minor label changes, which took us only a matter of days to correct but 4 months for their approval. We can now say that our label was finally approved  in writing by the FDA’s Center for Food Safety and Nutrition.

Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving manufacturing challenges: Based upon our first production experience in Austria with APO GmbH in Millsatt See, Austria the co-packer and a local Austrian formulator, we anticipate no issues with our next production run.  However, the building of a major brand requires a co-packer with International connections and very high volume capacity already on their locations.  Working through the Austrian Trade Commission  Starzinger was recommended to Mito-Chon.  This led to a series of conversations after confidentially agreements with Starzinger's head of production.  Starzinger has the bottling equipment for maxi pull top bottles and have worked together before with Ardagh Group in France our bottle manufacturer.  Starzinger has international know-how and years of co-packing experience enabling the company to be the ideal co-packer for Mito-Chon. State-of-the-art filling technology and the expert knowledge in all areas such as material, packaging or transport are what makes Starzinger one of the most competent and successful bottlers in the industry. Total reliability, an excellent price/performance ratio and maximum flexibility ensure individual attention to customers’ requirements. Customer support comes directly from the upper management level.     
In the future, depending upon our sales volumes we will give consideration to bottling in the USA with a co-packer to be determined.  Under this scenario and based upon high bottling purchasing volumes, Ardagh has a bottling manufacturing facility in Montreal but do not currently run our designed bottles at that location; however their managing director in France assured us that once we reach 1 M bottles per week, they will install a dedicated line for our bottles in Montreal thus saving overseas shipping freight costs. 
Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving distribution challenges:  Kroger has their own distribution centers as do all other big box grocery chains, but we have to first get Mito-Chon there. The same goes for Europa Nutrition with seven distribution centers, as does Bodybuilding.com Vitamin Shop, GNC.  We use Priority Worldwide Services (PWS) for international shipping, US Customs clearing and disbursement. PWS is a full service logistics provider operating around the globe. PWS operates strategically placed distribution facilities, 24/7, throughout the US and in key markets worldwide. PWS' US facilities are fully Customs Bonded and allow data to be linked between all offices, available for customers, obtainable directly from their website. PWS' facilities in the Port of Baltimore, MD. house the appropriate equipment and staff to handle major distributions/product roll-outs. PWS’ Warehousing Solutions attest to their flexibility and responsiveness to any situation.  PWS can break down full containers and ship them down to one case if need be to our buyers'  distribution or retail locations.   Mito-Chon wants to concentrate on our core business and need a reliable business partner to handle our distribution details. PWS is our solution.
Mito-Chon’s Plan for solving marketing challenges: It is the intent of the founder to build Mito-Chon 250mL into a billion-dollar brand within four years.  To make this happen the founder will invite a food and beverage investment partner with direct experience selling in the food and beverage industry, a partner preferably who sees billions of dollars of products that aren’t all that healthy for consumers and has been on mission to challenge what’s sold on those store shelves and has been successful in the food and beverage market. 
We know the challenges we face to alter, then change people’s perception of how energy is created and we have just that product in Mito-Chon 250mL and have been successful on a limited basis one-to-one, but we need to take that message nationwide, indeed worldwide.  It could be a sports celebrity who brings that message and/or an up and coming competitor in his sport.
We need a partner who shares our vision for bringing a disruptive product to these markets. We have the great product, great packaging,  great image and our passion runs deep. 
Mito-Chon’s Plan for individual markets; sports, trucking, and high stress professions: Examples. We have had successful samplings with long haul truckers, the backbone of our distribution network worldwide. Truckers take energy drinks like water, but the majority want something better because they know there will be a crash and burn. We currently have some truckers using Mito-Chon,  Recently we have sampled Mito-Chon with nurses and floor personnel in St. Luke's Hospital in the Houston Medical Center on two floors. For a long day or night working under stress there is nothing better than Mito-Chon.  A few ER doctors are taking Mito-Chon and love it. In October 2-17 the Company co-sponsored a Half-Marathon team of 8 runners in the Houston Half Marathon and 5K run.  All their times were lowered. 
Cycling as in Tour de France and Ride Across America, running in marathons and ultra-marathons, Ironman and competitive CrossFit are brutal on the competitors. Each sport or profession benefits from using Mito-Chon, the key is how we reach reach out to these markets. We believe each market is unique and we have that plan to reach each market without just throwing money at advertising and hope it sticks.

MITO-CHON FAQ


What is Mito-Chon?
Mito-Chon is a 250mL drink. It is in a new category unlike anything ever sold before. It does not create energy, it harnesses the essence of energy created within the body by the natural process of the energy engine performance of the mitochondria.
 


Who created it?
Ben Midulla, Dr. Rick Bellamy, Dick Meador, with special acknowledgement to Hans-Peter Strobel (Switzerland) and Dr. Seppe Porta (Austria).
 


Why should we use it?
Mito-Chon is our #1 life-enhancing, great tasting, clean formulation of all-natural beneficial ingredients that liberate the ENERGY WITHIN, your body's KEY to better health/feeling younger/performing better.
 


Is Mito-Chon a pre-workout?
No, it is not. Pre-workouts jack you up and then bring you down. Mito-Chon is more than that, it can be taken before, during or after. It is truly a game changer, in a class by itself, a complete all-in-one package that uniquely and naturally liberates the true energy within our bodies create through cell regeneration and the stimulation of ATP production.
 


Is Mito-Chon just for athletes?
NO. Mito-Chon is for any person who works under stress for long hours and needs more real energy which only comes from the good foods we eat and some supplements. If you work long hours knowing you must be focused and have real energy within you to overcome exhaustion, then Mito-Chon is for you. And Rock Stars love Mito-Chon.
 


Why is there only one product?
We don’t want to confuse YOU with choices of colors, flavors, etc. We don’t make separate products for pre-during-post-recovery. Just one product, Mito-Chon, one great taste--more than enough and your wallet will thank you. Should we come out with another product it will be built on the underpinning of Mito-Chon 250mL; and might just be a little quicker in getting to the mitochondria; but that’s the next chapter.
 


What is the mitochondria?
The human body is made up of about a hundred trillion cells and every one of those cells need energy to fuel and perform its individual functions from moving to thinking to breathing.  And that energy comes from the mito-chondria, the tiny "power plants" or tiny cellular “factories” that turn nutrients (food) into a chemical form of energy known as ATP (adenosine triphosphate). The mitochondria make the ATP from our food by a chemical process similar to the internal combustion in a car engine; instead of using gas and oxygen to release energy, food and oxygen is used (source Nick Lane’s book Oxygen). Muscle tissue is filled with mitochondria, and the more you have, the more energy your body produces; the mitochondria are the only place inside your body that can burn fat; the more muscle you have, the more fat you can burn. This is one of the reasons athletes and active individuals tend to be leaner.
 


How is Mito-Chon different from some energy/sports drinks?
What Mito-Chon® 250mL manifests is the evolution of the primitive concept of an "energy drink", which offers only a temporary experience, into the concept of a "life-enhancing formula", based on a deeper understanding of where real energy comes from. Mito-Chon is a clean technology that works with the body to enhance life fundamentally.
 


What are the active ingredients in Mito-Chon?
Only the finest natural ingredients, no synthetics (see list on website). As to Caffeine, we added a small amount of natural caffeine from the bean because there is evidence it can help in small amounts in central nervous system activity. It also affects adenosine receptors in the thalamus and enhances the synergistic effects of the other ingredients of Mito-Chon.
 


Why is sugar in Mito-Chon?
There is sugar and then there is sugar—sound confusing?  The only sugar in Mito-Chon is the good natural sugar from the Elderberry berry and flower —there are no added sugars, synthetics or stevia extract that may cause mild side effects such as nausea or stomach discomfort in some people. Erythritol, a sugar alcohol have a laxative effect, causing bloating, intestinal gas and diarrhea.  http://www.mito-chonusa.com/ingredients


Will I experience any side-effects?
No side effects, other than feeling good, with improved strength, performance, endurance, recovery, focus, etc.


What are the directions for use and the shelf life of Mito-Chon?

Life doesn't come with directions.  Take one bottle daily or two if you like. It’s all good. End of story.
And 2 years shelf life on production bottles.

PRODUCT FEATURES


What is the bottle made from?
Lined aluminum bottle by Ardagh Group in France, who also makes bottles for Coca-Cola and Red Bull.


What colors do you offer?
Red only with the elderberry flower on the pull off top.


What sizes do you offer?
250mL


Is it comfortable / attractive / discreet?
Mito-Chon is made with you in mind. The bottle fits nicely in your hand and the maxi pull off top can be reapplied. 


Bottle features?
The Mito-Chon bottle grabs anyone’s attention.


What are the recommend ages?
While there are no restrictions on age we would suggest 16+ and must be in good health. Parents should understand the ingredients and consult with their pediatribtion if they feel it necessary. A lot of young athletes are taking energy drinks with high levels of caffeine and other synthetic ingredients. Not good. 


Where can I use it?
Everywhere you go!


Is it safe?
Yes. All 16 ingredients can be bought separately in stores.


Are there any risks associated with use?
Our research and extensive vetting has shown Mito-Chon and its properties to be of little risk. No warning labels are required.

SHIPPING

When does shipping begin?
Late January 2018


When can we expect it to reach our doorsteps?
FedEx Ground for N. America. Arrival 1-3 days but largely dependent on where you live.  


Where does it ship?
Globally


How much is shipping?
A case is 16 lbs. Cost is approx. $20 in the USA


Do I have to pay VAT / GST?
Not in North America


CUSTOMER SERVICE


What is your refund policy?
We will not be able to refund orders once they've shipped.           


What is your return / exchange policy?
If you received your product and you  aren't satisfied, give or sell it to someone else. But, if you do have any issue, let us know and we will take care of it.


How can I check the status of my pre-order?
By pre-ordering through Indiegogo, you automatically have an account created. Log back into Indiegogo using the email you pre-ordered, to verify your information. We update periodically.


How do I upgrade my pre-order to a better one?
Email Mito-Chon via your Indiegogo account and a customer service representative will assist you


If I have other questions, who should I contact?
b.midulla@mito-chonusa.com

story:
Breve Presentazione 

Short Summary

Sono nato in Riviera del Brenta, a Fiesso d'Artico. Ora vivo a Vigonza, ma ho molto a cuore il mio territorio natio, che ho sempre sostenuto con alcune piccole iniziative. L'8 Luglio 2015 questa pittoresca zona è stata colpita da un improvviso e violento tornado  F4. In alcuni interminabili minuti sono state rase al suolo case private e ville storiche. Il bilancio finale conta un morto e 92, feriti di cui alcuni molto gravi, 500 case danneggiate di cui un centinaio da demolire. Oltre i 100 milioni di Euro di danni stimati.

I was born in Riviera del Brenta, in Fiesso d'Artico, which is a place I love. I always supported its surroundings with many cultural and recreative events. On 8th July 2015 a sudden and violent twister hits this pittoresque area. In a few endless minutes private homes and historical villas have been destroyed. Balance is one person dead and 92 injured, some very serious, 500 damaged houses of which one hundred to be demolished. Over 100 million of estimated damage.

Non è colpa di nessuno, sono cose che accadono. La forza della Natura è incontrollabile. Possiamo però aiutare a ricostruire la zona devastata, cercando soprattutto di sostenere le persone che sono state direttamente colpite dal tornardo.

A hurricane is nobody's fault, it's just Mother Nature. Therefore, the only thing that we can do is helping people involved and hit by this violent and devastating event to rebuild their houses.

Ho avuto l'idea di attivare questa campagna per dare la possibilità a chiunque lo desideri di contribuire e sostenere i rivieraschi in difficoltà. Lo strumento del crowfounding è semplice e trasparente, sotto gli occhi di tutti.

I got the idea to activate this campaign with the only purpouse to help the unlucky people living in this area who lost their home and need tangible help. Everybody can help them.

Quanto verrà raccolto, passerà tramite le associazioni di paese, che distribuiranno in maniera equa il denaro oppure, a seconda dei casi, decideranno di acquistare materiali e manodopera per conto delle persone colpite dalla calamità.

The income of this compaign will be donated to the local associations, which will either equally divide the money between people in need, or will buy building materials and pay workforces in their behalf.


Cosa abbiamo bisogno e cosa avrete.

What We Need & What You Get

L'offerta è libera, purtroppo non possiamo permetterci di dare dei riconoscimenti ai contributori della campagna. Spero che un grazie di cuore da parte di tutti i beneficiari sia sufficiente!

This is a free fee compaing, and I really have nothing to reward you either than a big "thank you".


Altri modi con cui potete contribuire

Other Ways You Can Help

Come avrete visto su Facebook anche i comuni hanno attivato dei conti correnti. Per maggiore trasparenza, ho preferito usare questo strumento, che  ha un costo (tra commissioni di paypal e di indiegogo) però assicura la massima trasparenza e può essere diffuso facilment, e soprattutto, spero arrivi anche oltre oceano.

As you might have seen in Facebook, many municipal districts actived current accounts for found raising. But I consider crowdfounding a clearer tool. Yes, it has a cost (paypal and indiegogo fees), but it is a fully transparent means to gather money, that can be easily spread in the world and reach even people far beyond the Ocean, where so many heart of gold live.

Nel nostro territorio ci sono aziende calzaturiere,  hotel e molte altre attività commerciali che lavorano con l'estero e i cui clienti apprezzano la nostra riviera.. Spero quindi che la nostra iniziativa possa raggiungere tutti e convincerli a supportarci.

In Riviera del Brenta there are many excellent shoes factories, hotels and other Companies trading their high quality handcrafted products all over the world. Foreign customers love our products and most of all love the river Brenta setting, the pittoresque villas, the lovely green.

Condividete in qualsiasi modo possibile l'iniziativa.

Please, help spreading this compaing and donating whatever you may possibly give.

Grazie.

Thanks in advance.

A questo link trovate un modo alternativo per dare il vostro supporto:

You may find a different way to donate checking the link below:

http://www.cittadellariviera.it/Interne/News.as...

story:
Who We Are

The Sprouting Root is dedicated in creating a warm, inviting, and creative eating retreat restaurant and drive-thru for adults and children that offer tasty organic, fresh, vegetarian and Paleo base dishes, juices and smoothies!  We are here to to support a healthy lifestyle. We hope to have our doors open by the end of 2017.  The Sprouting Root is focus on the promotion of being vocal in how we change the way our kids eat, as well for ourselves.  The Sprouting Root wants to be that reminder that parents and adults play a key role in helping our kids and children keep focus on how we take care of our bodies and how we must be consciously aware of our food and beverage choices that we make.

The Sprouting Root is not just about adopting a healthy lifestyle but also focus on increasing the appreciation of art in offering artists an "Artist Studio" so that artists of all mediums can exhibit their work.

Lastly, "The Sprouting Root" is dedicated and "rooted" in the idea of the farm-to-table concept, in that we want to grow a modest amount of our own produce and food and offer and expand those items on our menu.  The Sprouting Root wants to partner with schools and local schools in starting and sustaining their own school garden and garden program so that kids can know all the benefits of gardening such as responsibility, love of nature, creativity, fun and productivity and most importantly getting an education on nutrition and the importance of making healthier food choices.

What We Need and What You Get

We need your help and support to make this dream come to life! Your contribution will support the plans to build this project and expand the cause!

Your support will be a gift that gives back and a gift that will help us grow! In return we have some unique perks to offer! 

The Impact

The Sprouting Root's campaign is focus on making healthy choices for ourselves and for our children.  Rigorous research confirms that there is a clear connection between health, learning and overall well-being.  Healthy children and adults do benefit from the positive impacts of a healthy lifestyle and we want to make it a life mission to promote the benefits of adopting a healthy lifestyle.

Other Ways You Can Help

It's ok if you can't contribute but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about making healthy choices for yourself as well for others!

  • Become a part of your local garden program and/or start your own community/children garden program and encourage community involvement!

And that's all there is to it.

THANK-YOU IN ADVANCE FOR THE SUPPORT!!!

story:
Short Summary

​Local/Vegan/Artisanal/ Natural

Misfit Doughnuts and Treats 

Many if you are familiar with my treats.You have purchased them around Rochester at a few stores, coffee shops or at the Southwedge Farmers Market , where we have built up a loyal customer base.  It has long been our dream to open a seven-day-a-week brick and mortar operation, a neighborhood bakery that combines hand-crafted treats and delicious locally roasted coffee.  Misfit Doughnuts and Treats was born out of this dream.

And so, Misfit Doughnuts and Treats is asking for your help, because we want you to be able to walk in, grab a donut and a coffee and sit around, feeling self-satisfied because you were in on this before it was a reality, you helped to build it, you believed it into being, you contributed to making Rochester, NY more fun, more friendly, more vibrant and way yummier place to live.

Having a storefront has been a dream of mine for several years.  Help me make it happen

What We Need & What You Get    

We need help to get the doors open at the new location. We need equipment including a 2 door cooler, a deep fryer, a convection oven and a freezer, coffee equipment and ice cream equipment. (We will have doughnut ice cream sandwiches). We also need to do some installation work to install this equipment. There are also some small cosmetic changes  that need to update the space. 

The Impact

What we need is help in creating a storefront space that will allow  customers to come in and get doughnuts and coffee. Having a storefront will bring a  vegan bakery to the city of Rochester, and create a space where more and more people can make the connection that embracing a plant based diet equals delicious sweet treats. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Our goal is to open a storefront. Contributions  from this project will allow us to purchase equipment and help with expenses associated with opening a new business. 

One challenge that we are aware of is that the whole process of opening up shop might take longer than expected we are prepared for that, but are also going to work around the clock to get things in order asap!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Share and spread the word to anyone and everyone. 

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Gally's Brewing Company

As I sat watching the 4th of July parade in 2016, several of my family members noted that there seemed to be less floats in the parade than we had remembered in years past. We wanted to make a float; and we wanted another business in Harlo! Other than a Galahan (Speed) family float, we had no idea what to do.  Immediately, conversation slid to opening a brewery - which had long been a point of conversation with me and my friends. Three days later we were off to the races, making an offer on the Montana Building. 

We bought a building on main street (Central) to attract as many people to an area that will benefit the surrounding businesses as well. With an original background in finance, I immediately signed up for brewing classes over the next semester at MSUB, and have made batch upon batch with my co-brewmaster Matthew Speed. Additionally I have since spent most days arranging the financing of the project - Shanda (Galahan) Speed, Patrick Galahan, Tiffany (Galahan) Wietecki, Robert Galahan.  

This is a BIG project, with a huge (expensive) renovation, expensive equipment, and uncountable hours to bring it to fruition. So many hours, that it has required me to quit my finance job to work full time on Gally's! It is time to make it happen!

We have made significant progress so far, and have the majority of the project funded/budgeted for currently. That said, we are looking to not only make Gally's opening a sure thing, but simultaneously pull the projected opening date forward from our original estimate. 

We are shooting high, and hoping to raise the last $50,000 to purchase a few of the last pieces of equipment necessary (walk-in cooler, 2x jacketed fermentors, glycol chiller, tables and chairs) to provide a finished product, hopefully soon!

Cheers!

-Drew

story:
Short Summary

My Name is Michael. I am a proud graduate of the Culinary Institute of America's Baking and Pastry program. I am looking to bring over 5 years of professional bread baking experience to Mt. Pleasant. I love sharing my passion of fermentation with others, and feel that Mt. Pleasant is missing the greatness of a true artisan bread bakery. 

What We Need & What You Get

Okay, now time to get down to the nitty gritty: 

I am seeking $150,000 in funding. We will be utilizing this money to place a down payment on the building, complete renovations of the building to be ready for food production, purchase equipment, as well as get some ingredients to get started. 

 

Now, you're probably wondering..."What's in it for me?" I am offering a wide range of perks for my supporters. For contributions of $5, I'm offering a social media virtual High-Five. $10 contributions will earn yourself 2 free loaves of bread. For those who contribute $50, I'm offering 10 free loaves. $100 will earn you the right to claim 1 free loaf of bread a day for an entire year. If your feeling indulgent, a whopping contribution of $1000 or more will earn you 1 FREE LOAF A DAY FOR LIFE!!

The Impact

So now that you know what we need, and what you get for helping me out let's talk about how Central Michigan Bread Company will affect Mt. Pleasant:

  • We will be Mt. Pleasant's first truly artisan bread bakery.
  • We have the potential to help grow the local economy through the use of local ingredients, as well as offering our products to local business to use themselves. 
  • We look to help improve the health of our community through offering fully fermented bread products. Increasing research shows that fermented wheat products can be tolerated by those with gluten sensitivities. 

Risks & Challenges

Well let's face it, starting a business has it's challenges. Especially if that business is in the business of making and selling food. Here are a few challenges we could face:

  • The community doesn't accept an artisan product because they aren't familiar with true bread. We will combat this through advertising, attending events, and offering samples to help educate our community. 
  • The cost of our locally sourced ingredients increases beyond the point where our customers are willing to pay for the breads we will produce. If we face this challenge, we may have to lower our product standards and utlize less expensive national brands in order to keep ingredient costs in check. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help financially, I totally understand. That doesn't mean you can't help. Share our project on all of your available social media accounts so all of your friends, and family can help. If your friends and family don't have access to social media, shout it from the mountain top. The more people that know about our goal, the more likely you will be able to enjoy our amazing bread.
