story:
Production

We are currently in the pre-production phase which is the final step before distribution. Our design team has worked diligently to produce a premium quality product to deliver to our fraternity members. Shipping and logistics, as well as certain ongoing R & D issues, could pose additional challenges due to existing financial limitations.

Overview

Man Kup was created and designed in Valencia, CA. It’s the brainchild of serial entrepreneur, Gerald Taylor. Having thrown many ideas at the wall over the years, he has finally created one with the adhesive qualities to not only stick to the wall, but to bond to it in such a way that it has become somewhat of a collectible phenomenon. The pre launch consensus is unanimous. Man Kup is a slam dunk, and a bonafide must have accessory for every man and every Man Kave! Men everywhere are anxiously awaiting the arrival of this iconic piece of collectibles history. Never has there been a product with so much pre campaign buzz surrounding it as Man Kup. This kup is already in hot demand!

Man Kup was designed with the man and his “male ego” in mind. Inasmuch as it was designed by men and for men, it’s in no way intended to project any form of male dominance or superiority, nor does it imply inferiority in reference to women. But rather a product that we as men can claim as our own with undeniable certainty based on the feature characteristics of the Man Kup design. Everything about it says “MAN!” The size, the name, the texture, the logo (kaveman mascot), and the handprint. We want the world to know that this product has a clearly defined target audience and an exclusive demographic that existed long before the invention of Man Kup. The Man Kave!

 

Man Kup is fun personified and visualized through the lens of artistic expression. We wanted each Man Kup to be a fun experience for every fraternity member. We wanted each kup to evoke an emotional response in the owner. That’s why we say that no matter what your affinity, there’s a Man Kup just for you. Each Man Kup has its own voice, and speaks to a particular audience through the internal conduits of passion and emotion. Man Kup is all about passion and emotion! This company was founded on those two extremely powerful nouns. We understand that most of the things we “want” are based on a strong emotional connection to that thing, and/or a passion for it. We are passionate about our sports teams and the schools we attend and we have an emotional connection to certain causes or movements such as Breast Cancer Awareness or the Wounded Warrior Project. There’s an emotional connection to these causes because all of us have been touched by what these entities stand for, either directly or indirectly. And when it comes to sports you need only to turn on your television to see the indisputable power of passion and emotion.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup Enterprises is currently in its infancy stage of existence. We’ve just begun this journey of creating and designing these innovative works of art. There are dozens of categories depicting some of your favorite sports, military and hobby interests. Man Kup has a virtual unlimited treasure of ideas for all the collectors and novelty enthusiasts. But right now we are featuring our Man Kup Natural Stone Series Kup in Prehistoric Stone Gray. It is our flagship product and the catalyst kup for all future Man Kups and all future Man Kup merchandise. When we conducted our “proof of concept” survey, all we had was a finished prototype of our original design which came in solid Prehistoric Stone Gray. That kup in that color was enough to convince our audience to endorse our product with an overwhelming majority in favor of having one of their own. Our initial release will consist only of Man Kup Natural Stone Series in Prehistoric Stone Gray. All “color” variations will be released at predetermined time intervals based on licensing requirements, and continued research and development of the technology needed to produce the Kups as rendered. The funds we raise from this campaign will enable us to develop the tools and resources to accomplish our tasks, achieve our goals, and deliver a quality product to our fraternity members as promised and on schedule.

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup NFL: The NFL is an absolute beast of a business! What other sport has its own day where people nationwide gather together at stadiums, sports bars, in parking lots, and around televisions to watch grown men crash into each other for 3 hours every Sunday afternoon? The NFL brand is without question the most powerful and the most recognized brand in the world of sports, if not the world itself! That’s why obtaining licensing with them is so difficult. But that’s also why it’s so rewarding! All Man Kups featuring an NFL team logo will be available in 2021-22 due to the standard licensing protocol of the NFL Estimated release date: Summer 2022

 

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup NBA: The NBA has grown in popularity over the years thanks in large part to former players like Larry Bird, Magic Johnson and Michael Jordan, and current superstars like LeBron James, Steph Curry, and Kevin Durant, not to mention some very strategic marketing campaigns designed to inspire interest in the game and it’s star players on a global scale. Man Kup Enterprises can certainly see the value and the income potential of being associated with the association! NBA licensing requirements are equally as stringent as the NFL. I won’t list them all other than to say that it takes filling out a series of applications, meeting all of their licensing requirements, and paying all the royalty fees up front. After we obtain licensing, the fun begins and we can now produce your favorite NBA team logos onto our Man Kups. Estimated release date TBD

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Man Kup MLB: Americas pastime has a devoted, deep rooted fan base dating back to the early 1800’s. MLB fans are loyal to the core and they hold firm to the games original traditions more so than any other sport. Our MLB Man Kup Series is sure to capture the imagination of baseball fans everywhere as we recreate the historical logos of your favorite teams in vivid, brilliant colors. These Kups are built to last and make a great addition to your Man Kup collection.MLB has a very lengthy application process but it doesn’t require applicants to be in business for any specified amount of time. However there are some rather hefty up front royalties and additional fees to pay, in addition to a multitude of other business related questions, credit references, and contractual terms. Estimated release date TBD

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup NHL requires a five year history of producing products and sending them out to retail establishments, and at least five years in selling the product that it wants to sell using NHL licensed logos. The NHL also states that its absolutely necessary that the licensing agreement be entered into with the actual manufacturer of the product, not the company promoting or distributing the licensed product. Estimated release date: Fall 2024

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup NCAA: The NCAA Man Kup series promises to be a fun and exciting campaign because of the atmosphere surrounding the college game. From the Saturday morning game day telecast, to the tailgating parties and sold out stadiums across the country, nothing compares to the energy and enthusiasm of collegiate sports. With over 130 FBS schools and approximately 125 FCS schools in Division 1, the NCAA is BIG business. Although you must have licensing to use any of the NCAA official team logos, the process is far shorter and much less expensive than the big four professional sports leagues. Estimated release date: Summer 2022

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Man Kup Superhero Series is probably our most fun campaign. It’s reminiscent of a time gone by when we were kids dreaming of having the powers and abilities of our favorite super heroes. These beautiful kups will  create memorable moments for years to come. Imagine the conversations to be had when you come together with other Man Kup Super Hero Kup collectors and compare kups. What a fun experience! Who says grownups can’t be kids again! Estimated release dates TBD 

_________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup Armed Forces is for those of us who fight for the freedoms of this great nation and are proud to do so! Our Man Kup Armed Forces Series proudly displays the logos of our nations military forces in stunning Man Kup fashion. Bold designs, vibrant colors, and pride of ownership makes Man Kup Armed Forces Series a must have for all active duty, reserved, and retired military personnel. Whether Army, Navy, Air Force, or Marines we’ve got you covered. Estimated release date: Fall 2021

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

Man Kup Jurassic Park: Who hasn’t heard of Jurassic Park? Man Kup Jurassic Park will feature the iconic Jurassic Park T-Rex logo on our equally iconic Man Kup, creating an epic collectible Man Kup Natural Stone Kup in Prehistoric Stone gray color. This is the kup for the ages! Literally! With both logos having a prehistoric theme behind them, pairing them together was the natural thing to do. From a marketing standpoint it just makes sense, as both brands complement each other, being from the same genre. The Man Kup mascot is a kaveman and the Jurassic Park Mascot is a dinosaur, making them the perfect brand combination! There’s a whole generation of adults that were kids when the first Jurassic Park movie was released in 1993. And with each new Jurassic Park movie, legions of new fans of the franchise are being captivated as they imagine what life on earth would be like if these fantastic creatures still existed today. Man Kup Jurassic Park will be a magical ride through Hollywood as we team up with Universal Studios to become a mainstay in future Jurassic Park movies and merchandising campaigns. And with the worldwide appeal of the Jurassic Park franchise, and the power of Hollywood to market their movies and merchandise globally, Man Kup Enterprises will become synonymous with the Jurassic Park brand. Universal Studios, which owns the rights to Jurassic Park, has four theme parks worldwide, and it’s the vision of Man Kup Enterprises to become a permanent addition to their merchandising department at each of them. Estimated release date: Fall 2021 

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup Harley Davidson is one of our coolest Man Kups so far. It sports the classic “black & burnt orange” colors of the Harley Davidson brand and roars like the sound of a revving Harley Davidson engine when on display. All the outlaw bikers and iron horse bad boys will want this one of a kind collectible in their saddlebags for those long cross country rides, a ride up the coast, or just a ride across town. As a special treat and as incentive to become an owner of a Limited Edition Harley Davidson Man Kup, we’ve also implemented into our Harley Davidson marketing campaign a monthly sweepstakes that allows our fraternity members to compete for a chance to win a brand new Harley Davidson CVO Ultra Limited Motorcycle. So, if you’re thinking of someday buying a top of the line Harley for yourself or someone special, you could own one for the price of a single Limited Edition Man Kup. Details will be posted on our official Man Kup website once it’s up and running and after we acquire licensing from Harley Davidson. Estimated release date: Fall 2021

________________________________________________________________________________________

Breast Cancer Awareness is a cause that touches the lives of millions of women and families across the country and around the world. Man Kup Enterprises has created a special kup that captures the essence of the Breast Cancer Awareness movement. The pink ribbon symbolizes the strength and unity of survivors and acts as a constant reminder to those that have lost loved ones to this dreaded disease and encourages us all to continue the fight to find a cure. Man Kup Enterprises has pledged to give back a portion of all proceeds from the sale of our Breast Cancer Awareness Kups, and to start a foundation that sponsors research for the development of medicines to fight not just Breast Cancer, but other life threatening diseases as well. If you or someone you know has been affected by this deadly disease that claims the lives of over 40,000 women, and over 500 men each year, you can show your support by purchasing your very own Breast Cancer Awareness Man Kup. Together we can find a cure. Estimated release date: Fall 2020

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup Budweiser is a campaign that just makes sense no matter how you look at it. Let’s face it, Man Kup is a kup that most men will likely use as their primary kup for consuming their favorite beverage. (I’ll let you figure out what that beverage is) And what better partnership could there be than with the self proclaimed “King of Beers” and the King of Collectibles. Budweiser and Man Kup are the ultimate power couple and represent a matrimony made in marketing heaven. Estimated release date: Fall 2020 – Winter 2021

________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup America is really what Man Kup Enterprises is all about. This beautiful kup is a symbol of freedom, opportunity, and patriotism, and it reminds us all of what’s truly important in our lives. Imagine all the holidays where you can proudly display your Man Kup in honor of our nations flag. There’s the 4th of July, Memorial Day, Veterans Day, Labor Day, Presidents Day, and 911 Memorial Day. This kup is “special!” Estimated release date: Summer/Fall 2020

________________________________________________________________________________________

 

 

 

 

 

The vision of Man Kup Enterprises is to establish itself as the largest sports and specialty collectible kup company in the world by offering our fraternity members a fun, innovative, premium quality product that stretches the boundaries of our imagination and inspires people to dream big dreams and to believe beyond belief!

 

Specs:

Height: 9 inches tall

Width at opening: 4 1/4 inches

Overall width: 5 inches

Weight: 2.54 pds

Material: Polylac ABS – This material is food grade, FDA approved and safe for human consumption. It’s BPA free, dishwasher and microwave safe.

 

*Man Kup Enterprises offers a 5 year warranty on all Man Kups*

**If your Man Kup should crack or break within the first 5 years after you purchase it, mail the damaged Kup back to Man Kup Enterprises, along with a short written explanation of how it was damaged, and we will replace it absolutely free of charge! We want to know how our Kup, which is designed to last a lifetime, was cracked, chipped or damaged in any way. **

 

***Man Kup Enterprises is in a constant state of creativity and has a vast array of products that are not listed in this brief bio. Stay tuned to our campaign as we update our members of all the new and exciting products we have to offer. We are committed to providing our fraternity members an experience to remember whenever they purchase any of our Man Kup products. Until then, keep dreaming! Because it is in our dreams that we find our passion and our purpose for life!***

King Geramiah DeBois

Man Kup was created and designed in Valencia, CA. It’s the brainchild of serial entrepreneur, Gerald Taylor. Having thrown many ideas at the wall over the years, he has finally created one with the adhesive qualities to not only stick to the wall, but to bond to it in such a way that it has become somewhat of a collectible phenomenon. The pre launch consensus is unanimous. Man Kup is a slam dunk, and a bonafide must have accessory for every man and every Man Kave! Men everywhere are anxiously awaiting the arrival of this iconic piece of collectibles history. Never has there been a product with so much pre campaign buzz surrounding it as Man Kup. This kup is already in hot demand!

Man Kup was designed with the man and his “male ego” in mind. Inasmuch as it was designed by men and for men, it’s in no way intended to project any form of male dominance or superiority, nor does it imply inferiority in reference to women. But rather a product that we as men can claim as our own with undeniable certainty based on the feature characteristics of the Man Kup design. Everything about it says “MAN!” The size, the name, the texture, the logo (kaveman mascot), and the handprint. We want the world to know that this product has a clearly defined target audience and an exclusive demographic that existed long before the invention of Man Kup. The Man Kave!

 
Man Kup is fun personified and visualized through the lens of artistic expression. We wanted each Man Kup to be a fun experience for every fraternity member. We wanted each kup to evoke an emotional response in the owner. That’s why we say that no matter what your affinity, there’s a Man Kup just for you. Each Man Kup has its own voice, and speaks to a particular audience through the internal conduits of passion and emotion. Man Kup is all about passion and emotion! This company was founded on those two extremely powerful nouns. We understand that most of the things we “want” are based on a strong emotional connection to that thing, and/or a passion for it. We are passionate about our sports teams and the schools we attend and we have an emotional connection to certain causes or movements such as Breast Cancer Awareness or the Wounded Warrior Project. There’s an emotional connection to these causes because all of us have been touched by what these entities stand for, either directly or indirectly. And when it comes to sports you need only to turn on your television to see the indisputable power of passion and emotion.
________________________________________________________________________________________

Man Kup Enterprises is currently in its infancy stage of existence. We’ve just begun this journey of creating and designing these innovative works of art. There are dozens of categories depicting some of your favorite sports, military and hobby interests. Man Kup has a virtual unlimited treasure of ideas for all the collectors and novelty enthusiasts. But right now we are featuring our Man Kup Natural Stone Series Kup in Prehistoric Stone Gray. It is our flagship product and the catalyst kup for all future Man Kups and all future Man Kup merchandise. When we conducted our “proof of concept” survey, all we had was a finished prototype of our original design which came in solid Prehistoric Stone Gray. That kup in that color was enough to convince our audience to endorse our product with an overwhelming majority in favor of having one of their own. Our initial release will consist only of Man Kup Natural Stone Series in Prehistoric Stone Gray. All “color” variations will be released at predetermined time intervals based on licensing requirements, and continued research and development of the technology needed to produce the Kups as rendered. The funds we raise from this campaign will enable us to develop the tools and resources to accomplish our tasks, achieve our goals, and deliver a quality product to our fraternity members as promised and on schedule.
________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup NFL: The NFL is an absolute beast of a business! What other sport has its own day where people nationwide gather together at stadiums, sports bars, in parking lots, and around televisions to watch grown men crash into each other for 3 hours every Sunday afternoon? The NFL brand is without question the most powerful and the most recognized brand in the world of sports, if not the world itself! That’s why obtaining licensing with them is so difficult. But that’s also why it’s so rewarding! All Man Kups featuring an NFL team logo will be available in 2021-22 due to the standard licensing protocol of the NFL Estimated release date: Summer 2022 

 


________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup NBA: The NBA has grown in popularity over the years thanks in large part to former players like Larry Bird, Magic Johnson and Michael Jordan, and current superstars like LeBron James, Steph Curry, and Kevin Durant, not to mention some very strategic marketing campaigns designed to inspire interest in the game and it’s star players on a global scale. Man Kup Enterprises can certainly see the value and the income potential of being associated with the association! NBA licensing requirements are equally as stringent as the NFL. I won’t list them all other than to say that it takes filling out a series of applications, meeting all of their licensing requirements, and paying all the royalty fees up front. After we obtain licensing, the fun begins and we can now produce your favorite NBA team logos onto our Man Kups. Estimated release date TBD 
________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Man Kup MLB: Americas pastime has a devoted, deep rooted fan base dating back to the early 1800’s. MLB fans are loyal to the core and they hold firm to the games original traditions more so than any other sport. Our MLB Man Kup Series is sure to capture the imagination of baseball fans everywhere as we recreate the historical logos of your favorite teams in vivid, brilliant colors. These Kups are built to last and make a great addition to your Man Kup collection.MLB has a very lengthy application process but it doesn’t require applicants to be in business for any specified amount of time. However there are some rather hefty up front royalties and additional fees to pay, in addition to a multitude of other business related questions, credit references, and contractual terms. Estimated release date TBD

________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup NHL requires a five year history of producing products and sending them out to retail establishments, and at least five years in selling the product that it wants to sell using NHL licensed logos. The NHL also states that its absolutely necessary that the licensing agreement be entered into with the actual manufacturer of the product, not the company promoting or distributing the licensed product. Estimated release date: Fall 2024
________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup NCAA: The NCAA Man Kup series promises to be a fun and exciting campaign because of the atmosphere surrounding the college game. From the Saturday morning game day telecast, to the tailgating parties and sold out stadiums across the country, nothing compares to the energy and enthusiasm of collegiate sports. With over 130 FBS schools and approximately 125 FCS schools in Division 1, the NCAA is BIG business. Although you must have licensing to use any of the NCAA official team logos, the process is far shorter and much less expensive than the big four professional sports leagues. Estimated release date: Summer 2022

________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Man Kup Superhero Series is probably our most fun campaign. It’s reminiscent of a time gone by when we were kids dreaming of having the powers and abilities of our favorite super heroes. These beautiful kups will  create memorable moments for years to come. Imagine the conversations to be had when you come together with other Man Kup Super Hero Kup collectors and compare kups. What a fun experience! Who says grownups can’t be kids again! Estimated release dates TBD 
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup Armed Forces is for those of us who fight for the freedoms of this great nation and are proud to do so! Our Man Kup Armed Forces Series proudly displays the logos of our nations military forces in stunning Man Kup fashion. Bold designs, vibrant colors, and pride of ownership makes Man Kup Armed Forces Series a must have for all active duty, reserved, and retired military personnel. Whether Army, Navy, Air Force, or Marines we’ve got you covered. Estimated release date: Fall 2021

________________________________________________________________________________________
 
Man Kup Jurassic Park: Who hasn’t heard of Jurassic Park? Man Kup Jurassic Park will feature the iconic Jurassic Park T-Rex logo on our equally iconic Man Kup, creating an epic collectible Man Kup Natural Stone Kup in Prehistoric Stone gray color. This is the kup for the ages! Literally! With both logos having a prehistoric theme behind them, pairing them together was the natural thing to do. From a marketing standpoint it just makes sense, as both brands complement each other, being from the same genre. The Man Kup mascot is a kaveman and the Jurassic Park Mascot is a dinosaur, making them the perfect brand combination! There’s a whole generation of adults that were kids when the first Jurassic Park movie was released in 1993. And with each new Jurassic Park movie, legions of new fans of the franchise are being captivated as they imagine what life on earth would be like if these fantastic creatures still existed today. Man Kup Jurassic Park will be a magical ride through Hollywood as we team up with Universal Studios to become a mainstay in future Jurassic Park movies and merchandising campaigns. And with the worldwide appeal of the Jurassic Park franchise, and the power of Hollywood to market their movies and merchandise globally, Man Kup Enterprises will become synonymous with the Jurassic Park brand. Universal Studios, which owns the rights to Jurassic Park, has four theme parks worldwide, and it’s the vision of Man Kup Enterprises to become a permanent addition to their merchandising department at each of them. Estimated release date: Fall 2021 
________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup Harley Davidson is one of our coolest Man Kups so far. It sports the classic “black & burnt orange” colors of the Harley Davidson brand and roars like the sound of a revving Harley Davidson engine when on display. All the outlaw bikers and iron horse bad boys will want this one of a kind collectible in their saddlebags for those long cross country rides, a ride up the coast, or just a ride across town. As a special treat and as incentive to become an owner of a Limited Edition Harley Davidson Man Kup, we’ve also implemented into our Harley Davidson marketing campaign a monthly sweepstakes that allows our fraternity members to compete for a chance to win a brand new Harley Davidson CVO Ultra Limited Motorcycle. So, if you’re thinking of someday buying a top of the line Harley for yourself or someone special, you could own one for the price of a single Limited Edition Man Kup. Details will be posted on our official Man Kup website once it’s up and running and after we acquire licensing from Harley Davidson. Estimated release date: Fall 2021
________________________________________________________________________________________
Breast Cancer Awareness is a cause that touches the lives of millions of women and families across the country and around the world. Man Kup Enterprises has created a special kup that captures the essence of the Breast Cancer Awareness movement. The pink ribbon symbolizes the strength and unity of survivors and acts as a constant reminder to those that have lost loved ones to this dreaded disease and encourages us all to continue the fight to find a cure. Man Kup Enterprises has pledged to give back a portion of all proceeds from the sale of our Breast Cancer Awareness Kups, and to start a foundation that sponsors research for the development of medicines to fight not just Breast Cancer, but other life threatening diseases as well. If you or someone you know has been affected by this deadly disease that claims the lives of over 40,000 women, and over 500 men each year, you can show your support by purchasing your very own Breast Cancer Awareness Man Kup. Together we can find a cure. Estimated release date: Fall 2020 
_______________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup Budweiser is a campaign that just makes sense no matter how you look at it. Let’s face it, Man Kup is a kup that most men will likely use as their primary kup for consuming their favorite beverage. (I’ll let you figure out what that beverage is) And what better partnership could there be than with the self proclaimed “King of Beers” and the King of Collectibles. Budweiser and Man Kup are the ultimate power couple and represent a matrimony made in marketing heaven. Estimated release date: Fall 2020 – Winter 2021
________________________________________________________________________________________
Man Kup America is really what Man Kup Enterprises is all about. This beautiful kup is a symbol of freedom, opportunity, and patriotism, and it reminds us all of what’s truly important in our lives. Imagine all the holidays where you can proudly display your Man Kup in honor of our nations flag. There’s the 4th of July, Memorial Day, Veterans Day, Labor Day, Presidents Day, and 911 Memorial Day. This kup is “special!” Estimated release date: Summer/Fall 2020
________________________________________________________________________________________
 

 
 
 
 
The vision of Man Kup Enterprises is to establish itself as the largest sports and specialty collectible kup company in the world by offering our fraternity members a fun, innovative, premium quality product that stretches the boundaries of our imagination and inspires people to dream big dreams and to believe beyond belief!
 
Specs:
Height: 9 inches tall
Width at opening: 4 1/4 inches
Overall width: 5 inches
Weight: 2.54 pds
Material: Polylac ABS – This material is food grade, FDA approved and safe for human consumption. It’s BPA free, dishwasher and microwave safe.
 
*Man Kup Enterprises offers a 5 year warranty on all Man Kups*
**If your Man Kup should crack or break within the first 5 years after you purchase it, mail the damaged Kup back to Man Kup Enterprises, along with a short written explanation of how it was damaged, and we will replace it absolutely free of charge! We want to know how our Kup, which is designed to last a lifetime, was cracked, chipped or damaged in any way. **
 
***Man Kup Enterprises is in a constant state of creativity and has a vast array of products that are not listed in this brief bio. Stay tuned to our campaign as we update our members of all the new and exciting products we have to offer. We are committed to providing our fraternity members an experience to remember whenever they purchase any of our Man Kup products. Until then, keep dreaming! Because it is in our dreams that we find our passion and our purpose for life!***
King Geramiah DeBois

story:
Cider Corps is a veteran owned and operated company built by brothers, Jason, Sgt, USMC (Ret.), and Josh Duren. Cider Corps’ beginnings were not typical, but have shaped the vision and mission of what it is today.

While deployed in Afghanistan, Jason suffered two traumatic brain injuries from multiple IED blasts. Upon returning home, he was looking at a long road towards medical retirement and an unknown future. During the retirement process, Jason and Josh began experimenting with cider making as a hobby and therapeutic outlet for Jason. Out of this hobby has come a unique technique for cider making. Over the past 3 ½ years, this technique has earned Cider Corps outstanding reviews from significant people within the beverage and culinary industry. With these reviews, Jason and Josh were encouraged to move this hobby into a business.

For the two years after deployment, Jason struggled through the medical retirement process. Through hundreds of appointments, frustration with care and struggling to move forward, it became apparent that disabled veterans needed more support. All of these experiences became the crux that propelled Cider Corps into blending the love of crafting cider with the desire to serve and give back to fellow veterans.

While the process was grueling, there was a bright light at the end of the tunnel. Cider Corps has completed their production space and is launching their distribution program.  The next build-out phase is the taproom.  Cider Corps is hopeful that with your support they will successfully start the most integral part, the heartbeat, of Cider Corps.

 

Join Cider Corps and enjoy drinks that will change the lives of others!

story:
English Follow

Intro

La route qui mène nos cafés d’exception de l’arbre à votre tasse est longue.

Chez Traffic, nous avons à cœur de traiter avec respect le sol qui lui donne vie, les agriculteurs qui veillent sur lui, les artisans qui le torréfient.

Et, afin que cette aventure épique ait aussi des retombées positives ici, nous offrons un petit déjeuner à un enfant dans le besoin pour chaque sac de café vendu.

Nous sommes des lève-tôt. Mais nous croyons qu’il n’est jamais trop tard pour bien faire, au coin de la rue, comme aux quatre coins de la terre.

Bienvenue dans le club.

-TCC
http://trafficcoffee.com

-----


Intro

The road that leads to our exceptional coffees - from the tree to your cup - is a long one.

At Traffic, we cherish the soil which gives life to our coffee, the farmers who look after it daily and the craftsmen who roast it perfectly.

To make sure this epic adventure echoes positively in our community, for every bag we sell, we provide a breakfast to a child in need.

We are morning people. But we believe it’s never too late to create change, may it be right down the road or everywhere else on Mother Earth.

Welcome to the Club.

-TCC
http://trafficcoffee.com/en

 

 

Les besoins

Nous avons besoin de 25 000$ pour acheter l'équipement nécessaire au voyagement et à la sélection de nouveaux cafés. Un mini-four à torréfaction pour échantillons, une machine à espresso portable, des quantités des meilleurs grains de café que nous pouvons dénicher exclusivement. Également pour développer la plate-forme d'abonnement en ligne pour les membres de notre club: afin de vous faire voyager dans le confort de votre maison!


L'impact

Nous souhaitons générer un impact positif dans nos communautés locales, partout à travers le pays, et chez nos producteurs de café d'exception, partout dans le monde :

1) Commerce direct

Nous travaillons à bâtir des relations durables avec nos producteurs. En éliminant les intermédiaires et en payant le juste prix, nous permettons aux familles de bien vivre et réinvestir dans leur ferme.

2) Développement durable

Pour enrichir la floraison des arbres Arabica, nos fermes productrices utilisent des engrais respectueux de la terre.

3) Emballage réutilisable et recyclable

Lorsque vous devenez membres du Club, vous adhérez à un code d'éthique pour agir positivement avec nos emballages tous réutilisables et recyclables afin de minimiser notre impact sur l’environnement.

4) Petit déjeuner pour un enfant

En achetant nos cafés, vous agissez aussi localement pour réduire les inégalités. Pour chaque sac vendu, nous offrons un petit déjeuner à un enfant dans le besoin.

5) Torréfaction locale artisanale

Fiers artisans de Montréal, nous travaillons fort pour vous offrir le juste équilibre dans nos torréfactions dans le but de respecter le produit et d'en maîtriser les saveurs.

6) Découvertes dans chaque sac

Nous travaillons à créer des expériences de contenus stimulantes, vous permettant d’avoir une connexion avec nos producteurs et suivre les retombées positives chez nous.

 

Les défis

Le risque de notre modèle d'affaires est basé sur l'abondance d'offre en café présentement, et beaucoup de cafés qui se positionnent comme offrant un produit de "qualité". L'art de torréfier artisanalement un café n'est pas donné à tous, et nous sommes persuadés qu'avec les cafés d'exception Traffic que nous emmènerons chez vous, chaque membre pourra goûter la différence. C'est donc dire que nous aurons beaucoup d'éducation à faire et d'activations. Également, le risque environnemental des changements climatiques est toujours très présent et menace d'éradiquer la variété Arabica de la planète, ce qui met en danger le café de qualité. Chez Traffic, nous nous efforçons de travailler avec des fermes qui optent pour des pratiques éco-responsables de développement durable.


D'autres façons d'aider

Pour chaque sac de café vendu, nous donnons un petit-déjeûner à un enfant dans le besoin. C'est notre façon de redonner dans notre communauté, et de faire une différence. Nous voulons agrémenter les matins des adultes en fournissant un café exceptionnel qui vous fera partir la journée du bon pied. Nous voulons jouer le même rôle chez nos jeunes, les adultes de demain. #TrafficForChange

Vous aimez notre projet ?
Merci de partager sans modération!
http://trafficcoffee.com

 

-----

Our Needs

We need 25 000$ to buy the necessary equipment to source and roast our exceptional coffees. More specifically, a sample roaster and a portable espresso machine. In addition, these funds will help us source exclusive high quality coffees in direct trade with global producers . Your funding will help us build our on-line membership platform for you, our members.


The impact

We want to make a positive impact in our local communities, across the country, and among our outstanding coffee producers around the world:

1) Direct Trade

We aim to develop long term relationships with our producers everywhere on Earth. By working directly with the farmers and paying a fair price for their quality product, we ensure these families can make a comfortable living and reinvest in their farms.

2) Sustainability

To make sure their Arabica trees provide the best coffee possible, our producers are using organic fertilizers and have strict policies in regards to sustainability.

3) Responsible Packaging

Once you join our Club, you support environmental values. All of our packaging is reusable and recyclable, to ensure we have the least impact possible on our environment.

4) Breakfast for kids in needs

When you support Traffic, you will also make a positive impact in your community. For every coffee bag we sell, we provide a breakfast to a local child in need.

5) Local Micro Roasting

As proud crafters from Montreal, we work hard to offer you the best roasts possible for our beans. The care we put into our product allows you to discover all the flavors exceptional coffee has to offer.

6) Each Bag is an Adventure

ATraffic strives to create visual experiences, allowing you to make the connection between our producers and the positive impact you make at home.

 

The Challenges

There are many risks in launching a coffee company; the abundance of competitors in the market is a definitely challenge. A lot of coffee roasting companies position their brands as roasting "high-end" coffees, which is not the case. The art of micro-roasting exceptional coffees is not simple, and that is what we will be bringing into your home. You will taste the difference, we guarantee it. The environmental risk is also there, as the Arabica variety is in danger if we don't change something in the way we treat the planet. Traffic Coffee Club is working solely with farmers who have strict environmental and sustainability policies.


Other ways to help

For each bag of coffee we sell, we provide a breakfast to a child in need. Traffic Coffee Club strives to upgrade your mornings and make sure you start your day on the right foot. We want to have the same role with children, tomorrow's generation. #TrafficForChange

You love our project ?
Share the love!
http://trafficcoffee.com

story:
Our *Community* Farm

Our family has been given an incredible opportunity to build a farm from the ground up in the beautiful Happy Valley in Rossland, British Columbia. Because of the generous support of another wonderful family in our community we have leased 6 acres of ALR farm land to build our dream farm on. We are so excited to grow good food for our community and we know the people who call Rossland home are ready to eat it!

Dan and I (Miche) have been growing food in our mountain town intensively for the past 5 years, and have spent much time prior to that working on farms and orchards throughout the Kootenays and Okanagan. My career has had me working in various capacities in my local food shed since 2008 - farming, fruit picking, growing food, volunteering, managing the farmers' market, working for Kootenay Food, participating in agricultural forums across the region. For the past 7 years Dan has been studying bio intensive farming systems, permaculture principles for small farms, and sustainable agriculture.

It has always been our dream to have our own farm where we could build a space for food production that considers and preserves the environment, and opens its doors to welcome the community with a space for experiential learning and hands-on education.

Happy Hills Farm will be a diversified farm that produces nutrient-dense vegetables, fruit, herbs, eggs, heritage chicken and specialty handcrafted preserves. Our farm will be home to multiple greenhouses that will help us attain our goal of year round food production. We will also host the only farm stand in our community (open every Saturday morning!) to increase access to our food.

We plan to work with our local school to begin to introduce opportunities for on-farm education for students in our community. We have already begun to feel out this potential by meeting with teachers and a local outdoor educational organization.

It's important to us that our farm be a place of learning. We are developing a meaningful volunteer work program that provides hands-on skill building sessions and instruction on how to grow food here in Rossland. Volunteers donate their time while learning beneficial skills to use at home to grow their own food. Knowledge sharing, in our opinion, is essential in our quest for strengthening food security. We want our farm to be a place our community can use to expand our knowledge on local food systems.

By supporting our campaign you are helping us realize our dream of using our passion and experience to build Happy Hills Farm -  a place that prioritizes land stewardship, organic farming principles, experiential learning spaces, and nutrient dense food production.

What's A Dollar Worth?

We want to share with you some of the things this campaign will fund and let you know just how valuable a dollar can be! Here are different ways your donations may be used:

$10: One bush, shrub or tree for wildlife habitat. One harvest tote.

$25: A first aid kit.

$50: One garden bed worth of season extension hoops.

$100: A salad greens washer. A salad greens spin dryer.

$250: An efficient seeder (to seed our 50,000 carrots). A sturdy farmers' market tent.

$500: Portable electric chicken fencing. Or a farm cart!

$750: On-farm market stand. Or, a covered washing and packing station.

$1000: Five garden blocks plowed and shaped.

$1200: One caterpillar tunnel.

$1500: Certified organic compost delivered to our farm. Or, deer fencing for all garden blocks.

$2000: Irrigation system for four garden blocks. A walk in cooler for food storage.

$5000: A walk behind tractor (for minimal land disruption).

$10,000: One year round operational greenhouse.

$15,000: A year round operational hothouse.

$20,000: A wetland habitat sanctuary.

$25,000: An off grid solar system that will bring electricity to the farm. Or wages for two part time employees!

Our farm is very much a work in progress. We know it will take us a few years to reach many of our goals, and that is just how farming goes! Each year we will make progress and new investments into the farm. As we grow we'll expand our operations until we reach our goals and full potential. Every dollar counts towards the end goal, even if it is far away. We value every investment and can't wait to share our progress with you!

The Impact

Our farm will directly contribute to our local food system, by providing healthy, delicious food for our community and surrounding area. We'll enhance our local economy, help build a healthy community, and provide local hands-on food education opportunities for youth and people who want to learn about growing food (in the mountains!).

Each and every day we will strive to help build connections between people and their food. We think that the deeper we become connected with the food on our plates, the healthier we and our world will be.

On a larger scale (- a global scale! -) we are one teensy piece to a very large puzzle....but without us the puzzle is incomplete! Each and every small farm that exists to grow healthy food, build communities, strengthen economies, provide meaningful local jobs, and help the world learn about the importance of supporting localized food systems, contributes to the worldwide movement of health, sustainability, environmental stewardship and land preservation. Local food systems play a vital role in reducing our impact on the Earth, and our farm, although a small piece to the puzzle, will strive to be an exemplary model of organic and sustainable farming in order to reduce our footprint and preserve our beautiful piece of farm land.

We have BIG dreams for this farm. We would love to have you join us on this journey!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are lots of ways you can help!

Please consider helping us to share our campaign and spread the word about our farming initiative. This is a great way to help, and Indiegogo has good sharing tools you can use.  You can also share in emails or facebook.

We have a number of big projects coming up, and chances are we'll need some supportive hands on deck to help us out. If you'd like to jump right in and get your hands dirty, let us know.

If you're in the area and want to support us by purchasing our fresh produce, let us know and we can get some to you! We are currently running a microgreens delivery program in Rossland and have room for more folks to "get on the fresh delivery route".

We'd love to hear from  you and have your support! The best way to get in touch is via email:

grow@happyhillsfarm.ca

 

Questions?

Please don't hesitate to get in touch! We would love to answer your questions and help you learn more about our farm. Please email us at: grow@happyhillsfarm.ca .

story:
We've been mentioned in...


 


Why We Need Your Help 

We are asking for your contribution in order for us to produce the 1Carb, 15 Calorie tortilla. We will use the contributions to upgrade our machinery and expand our production. Our goal is to raise $50,000 as we are very confident that it will help us achieve our production and expansion goals for this tortilla. 
 

Already Shipping

 

Our Story 

Hi there! We’re Anthony and Ronald Alcazar, the founders of Mr. Tortilla.

Our company’s story and mission

We founded Mr. Tortilla in San Fernando, California after seeing the need to create a healthy yet affordable tortilla for people, without sacrificing flavor. Growing up in a Hispanic household, we were always used to the delicious taste of homemade tortillas and wanted to replicate that homemade taste in our tortillas. With the goal to create the best tortilla in the world engrained in our mind, we set out to accomplish this as recent UCLA graduates in 2012. Since then, we are proud to say that we have successfully created an amazing product. Along with our traditional flour tortilla’s success, our low-carb tortillas became a hit staple in the low-carb/keto community. It went on to become the #1 best selling tortilla on Amazon and Mr. Tortilla is now one of the fastest-growing companies in Southern California.

Along with our mission of creating the world’s most delicious tortilla, we also made it a commitment to donate 10% of our net profits to charities and 10% to employee profit-sharing.

We are now also on a mission to revolutionize tacos. A couple of years ago, after devouring 8 double-tortilla tacos, we experienced post-taco-guilt. As a result, we had the idea of creating a guilt-free tortilla for all taco lovers like us, so we set out to create the world’s best low-carb taco tortilla. After many years of development, we have now created the world’s first 1 carb, 15 calorie taco tortilla. We took everything into consideration when making this tortilla such as size, creating the perfect crunch, including the perfect amount of ingredients to create both a filling and delicious tortilla. It is the perfect taco tortilla, allowing all of us to enjoy tacos without guilt! 

​Now we have developed the world’s only 12inch low-carb tortillas. So that people on a low-carb diet can now enjoy monster burritos!

story:
Do you struggle with any of the following?

 

Eating from a lunchbox means fewer options for what you can eat and where you can eat. But we have a solution that’s out-of-the-(lunch)box!

 

Meet the water-activated self-heating lunchbox that can heat your food wherever you want. All it takes is one of our heating pads and a bit of water.

 

Just open the lunchbox and place one heating pad inside. Then pour water over the heating pad and put the food container on top of the pad. Close the lunchbox, and in five minutes, your meal is ready.  

As effortless as making cup noodles, but healthier.

So whether you want to have a warm stew for lunch, have a meal by the sea, or just avoid the long line at the office microwave, UZME is the lunchbox for you.

 

Camping

 

Park or the Office

Beach

 

Social distancing and other COVID-19 restrictions have forced many workplace kitchens to close or dining areas to have only limited seats available. This also makes the capability to heat your meals anywhere (particularly outdoors) a particularly convenient alternative.

 

 

Stylish

UZME has a bold, original look that matches its magical heating technology.

The default ribbon color is orange, but you can purchase an extra ribbon add-on (which may be useful in case you lose the original) and choose from an array of colors and patterns through surveys sent out after the campaign ends, to match your lunchbox to your style.

 

Quick heating

With UZME, you can heat up your meals in just 5 minutes - wherever you want. No more time spent in line waiting to use the microwave!

UZME’s fast steam heating method means you don’t have to sacrifice efficiency, health, or taste.

Enjoy fast food that won't make you feel guilty,

 

 

Steam heating

UZME uses a steam heating method that leaves food as fresh and tasty as when it was first cooked.

 

Insulated walls

UZME has a double wall design that concentrates more heat and offers more insulation than a regular wall, so that your meals get hot faster and stay hot for the longest time.

 

Leak-proof

UZME uses a double insulation mechanism where the food container has its own lid and is enclosed in the outer shell of the lunchbox. This construction ensures a tight fit and no leakage.

 

Dishwasher-safe

UZME is made of material that can endure high temperatures and strong detergents used in dishwashers.

 

Portability

UZME has a handle for easy transportation, and uses a double seal mechanism that ensures no spillage of liquids.

 

Easy packing

Today, there are so many options to heat your food, but none are as portable as UZME. Bring only the UZME lunchbox, a heating pad, and some water, and you now have the freedom to choose wherever you want to eat.

All you need is UZME.

 

Technology

Each heating pad is made up of a unique mixture of minerals. When water is poured on top of the pads, it goes through the fabric and reaches the mix. Thanks to the power of thermodynamics, that contact turns water into steam, which rises and condenses on the outer surface of the food container, transferring the heat to the food inside.

 

That steam is what raises the temperature of your food up to 185ºF or 85ºC.

 

Note: this video was shot with a previous lunchbox design.
 
 
The insulation of the lunchbox guarantees its inside is like an oven, heating your meals properly.

Safety

The heating pads release steam which heats the meals. This steam is nothing other that the water that is poured on top of the heating pad, turned into the gaseous state by the heat released.

The minerals inside the heating pads are contained by the fabric and do not flow to the outside.

Since the food is inside the closed food container (it comes with a silicon heat-proof lid), the steam doesn't even come into direct contact with it.

 

Future Orders

Post-campaign, you will always be able to order more heating pads through our online store.

We'll also launch a monthly heating pad delivery service, on a subscription basis. Through it, you can order the number pads you want for each month, and they will be delivered to your doorstep.

We're also in negotiations to establish partnerships with retailers to sell the heating pads in the United States, Canada, all across Europe, Eastern Asia, Australia and New Zealand. More countries will follow.

 

As opposed to eating out where you can’t control your portions, getting takeout and using disposable lunchboxes, or using a lunchbox that requires electricity, UZME offers a cheaper, healthier and more sustainable alternative. 

 

UZME aims to make hot, nutritious meals convenient and accessible to everyone, including the millions of people who still suffer from malnourishment today. That’s why, for every lunchbox sold, a portion of the profits will be donated to provide one meal to a child in need through the United Nations World Food Programme (WFP).

Environmental impact is another major concern which is why we will also contribute a part of the profits to plant one tree through TreeSisters, a women-led reforestation non-profit organization.

 

 

Similar to what happens with coffee capsules, we have a plan to recycle our heating pads through a collection point system. We want to have small decentralized recycling sites, where the pads are subjected to a staged, industrial drying process, which regenerates their heating potential. For us to be able to make this possible, we require substantial backing to purchase all the necessary equipment. We cannot do it just yet, but will put this plan into motion as soon as possible!

                                                                      

 

 

Disclaimer: since our campaign is based in the European Union, our prices are in Euros; conversion to US$ is based on exchange rates as of time of writing, which can vary during and after the campaign.

 

 

*Launched as soon as we have shipped all of our crowdfunding orders.

 

We tested many combinations of the heating pads until we reached the perfect compromise between heat generation efficiency and practicability. But the heating pads weren’t enough by themselves. In order to actually heat the food, we needed to design a dedicated lunchbox. 

 

The lunchbox was born from a bunch of poorly-drawn sketches on napkins and tiny pieces of paper, which then grew to become computer renderings of more complex designs.  We created a lot of prototypes (thank God for 3D printing) and, after two years of product development, ended up with this awesome product.

 

Every part of the lunchbox and its heating pad system was designed for efficiency, as well as usability, in order to deliver a quality product to our users.

 

PENDING INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY REQUEST

 "IDEAS POWERED FOR BUSINESS"

 

To ensure UZME is produced at the highest quality, we're working with a reliable lunchbox manufacturer, for their experience in similar production duties and commitment to maintaining high quality standards.

Now that we’ve picked out our manufacturers for the parts, we await our first batch of orders through our crowdfunding campaign. The funds collected through the campaign will finance the initial orders to the factories.

 

 

 

Find UZME elsewhere

  Facebook                    Instagram                    E-mail

 

In partnership with



braag - A boutique pre-launch to post-launch marketing agency leveraging data-driven customer acquisition to fuel record-breaking crowdfunding campaigns.

story:
Everyone’s hands, grip, and level of control and comfort are different - so why do we all use the same knives?!

It’s finally time to update the boring traditional chef’s knife! 

Ecriture Perfect Knives are designed to adapt to every grip and every level of expertise. 

We’ve worked with some of the world’s best chefs to engineer the “perfect” knife. Through our research and development, we’ve designed easy-to-use adjustable-balance knives to tell your story through food.

With a simple slide control, you can change the center of gravity on these weighted, ergonomic knives giving you the highest level of control, precision, and accuracy while chopping, dicing, slicing, cutting, and even disjointing!

 

Created from industry-leading AUS-10 Japanese steel with sub-zero treatment honed to an astounding 15-degree angle, these knives cut through all kitchen scenarios like butter and will revolutionize the way you will prepare your meals.

Most chef’s knives are honed to about 20 degrees. Écriture Perfect Knives use high-carbon Japanese AUS10 steel and finish each blade by hand to a SUPER sharp 15 degrees to handle anything and everything in your kitchen. 

Achieve perfect balance with our patented SwingTech® technology to instantly change the center of gravity to adapt to anything. Perfect for all uses with unprecedented control and accuracy. Easily adjust the balance back for more power and forward for precision cuts.

Your hands are unique. Écriture knife handles are inspired by badminton handles to give you total control. The thinner base is comfortable to hold and the wide top gives you ultimate precision. All of our ergonomic handles are made with soft-touch antibacterial materials to keep you safe and healthy.

A knife for everything!  With professional-grade Écriture Perfect knives, you will no longer need to waste time and money buying different knives for every need. You get every tool for any possibility in the kitchen.

Personalize your Écriture knives to fit your home and personality. You can have any name or phrase engraved into the steel blades (up to 35 characters) to customize the knives for yourself or to give as a personal, thoughtful gift to loved ones.

Écriture uses robotics and technology to ensure dramatically sharp blades to cut, slice, and chop through any food with ease and precision. Sharper than most knives on the market, you use less effort to get the best results. 

Ecriture Perfect Knives are meant to last. To prove this, we provide a lifetime warranty on all of our knives. If anything ever goes wrong, we’ll take care of it - guaranteed!

Our lifetime warranty means you’ll always have the perfect knives to tell your story.

We have reinvented the magnetic knife block with a convertible magnetic knife block that is aesthetically pleasing and fits into any size and style of kitchen.

You can mount the magnetized knife holder onto the wall with the provided hardware to hang your knives vertically and save counter space (and keep them away from little hands!) OR use the freestanding eco-friendly Richlite base to store your knives horizontally. Either way, you will have a beautiful germ-free knife storage solution.

One side of this cutting board is chopping, slicing, and dicing with a convenient groove to catch runoff and juices. The other side is a simple and elegant serving platter.

The cutting board is made of an environmentally-friendly material called Richlite that is easy to clean. Using high pressure and heat, hundreds of food-safe resin-soaked sheets are pressed together and fused into a solid material to look like wood. It’s extremely durable and lightweight, nonporous, and dishwasher-safe. This cutting board is designed to keep your knives from going dull and the Richlite material is naturally antibacterial to keep you safe and healthy.

For any of the add-ons listed below, simply increase your pledge amount by the dollar amount listed below and select the add-ons in the survey after the Indiegogo campaign has ended. You can get as many add-ons as you want!

**For the laser engraving customization add-on, YOU MUST list what you want engraved on the blade of the knife or knives you purchased in the notes area of your pledge. Up to 35 characters (including spaces).**

Unlock these exciting options when the project reach the target funding below!

Founders Pierre and Stephan, along with a team of engineers and designers, spent 18 months designing and creating prototypes of knives, looking at shape, feel, comfort, grip, ease of use, and more. With every iteration and every test, they came closer to perfection.

Throughout the design process, we worked with and interviewed top chefs from around the globe to find out:

  • How they use their knives
  • What knives are most important to them and why
  • What is missing from knives currently on the market
  • What knives they use most and why
  • What they need from a “perfect” knife
 

Ecriture came at this design process from an engineering standpoint, looking to create a comfortable, ergonomic grip and a blade sharper than other knives but still easy to adjust and use. We even engineered and patented Swingtech technology for the balance adjustment, giving you unprecedented control and versatility with every single knife.

The result is a knife with perfect combination between contemporary and practicality that are designed for YOU.

We have spent the last 18 months perfecting the design of the Ecriture Perfect Knives and are now ready to begin the production and manufacturing process. We have already begun the tooling for custom pieces and tooling will be complete by the end of July 2020, as soon as we reach our funding goal and the Indiegogo campaign ends.

For the next 30 days, production in small test batches will begin, overseen by Stephan at every step. In September 2020, we plan for the first runs of mass production to start. Assembly and packaging will happen in October, and shipping begins in November. We have worked with our manufacturers and factories to ensure all of the Indiegogo orders will be delivered before Christmas 2020.

The production process follows these steps:

  • 1. Creation of molds and tooling.
  • 2. Manufacturing and producing individual pieces.
  • 3. Assembly in the warehouse.
  • 4. Design and creation of packaging.
  • 5. The product is packaged and shipped via international courier services.

"I co-founded Ecriture because I love the connection between food and family. Cooking a meal tells a story and food brings people together. I wanted to create the perfect knives with luxury engineering and design to bring more people together and allow every home cook and chef to tell their stories with total control and precision, all with a gorgeous and premium knife made for anything."

— Pierre

"I love working with Pierre because our skills are perfectly complementary. He focuses on the design and I love working with our manufacturers and clients. Creating these knives to tell any story has been extremely satisfying and seeing how they are made and working with the manufacturers to get them to be exactly perfect is a process I truly enjoy.”

— Stephan

When Pierre Regnault founded Écriture Kitchen, he laid the company’s foundations in the act of writing - that’s what the French word Écriture means.

For centuries, stories and meals are how we’ve connected with other people. Food always tells a story, as does how it is lovingly crafted for the people we care about.

Our knives allow you to write a new story every day in your kitchen. That’s why we innovate the way we did with SwingTech® - Anybody could write any story through their food with a knife that feels just right in their hands every time.

Tell YOUR story of a simple Sunday family meal, a quick snack, or a feast with friends using the Écriture perfect knife set to create the perfect meal.

Join our referral program :)

You can make a difference. Help us spread the word #EcriturePerfectKnife to your friends! Your support and input will ultimately make Écriture Perfect Knife even more perfect!

Click to download our press release kit :)

NEW TO Indiegogo?

First time backing an Indiegogo project? We figured you could use some help! Send us a direct message and our customer service team will respond to you as soon as possible m.me/ecriture.kitchen

  •  What is Indiegogo?
    Indiegogo is a crowdfunding site, most often used as a launchpad for companies and inventors to raise funds for the initial production of their invention. This not only funds production but proves market viability for the product. Backers (that's you!) support the new product and the company by pre-ordering the product at a discounted price. The funds from Indiegogo campaigns are invested directly into the creation, production, assembly, and shipping of the product.
  •  What does it mean to back a project (pledge)?
    When you back a project, you are pre-ordering the product. That means you'll get the product as soon as it's produced. Besides getting the product itself, you're also joining a community. You get to follow along with the production process, take part in important surveys, and give the company valuable feedback - often, your feedback results in changes and adjustments to the actual product.
  •  How do I pledge?
    In order to pledge, click that pink button that says “Back it” or select a specific pledge/reward to back. You'll select your shipping country and choose your desired pledge level and reward, and set up your payment.
  •  When do I make color choices/engraving choices and input my specific mailing address?
    After the Indiegogo campaign ENDS on  7th August 2020, you will receive a survey by EMAIL where you will input your physical mailing address and make additional choices. This survey goes out to all backers after the campaign is complete.
  •  When is my money collected?
    Your money will not be collected until after the Indiegogo campaign ENDS on  7th August 2020. If the project is canceled for any reason, you won't be charged.
  •  What payment methods can I use?
    You can use any debit or credit card, such as Visa, Mastercard, or American Express, Discover, or JCB cards. Indiegogo does not accept payments with PayPal.
  •  When will I get my pre-order?
    The Ecriture Perfect Knivesare set to ship out to you in November/December 2020. Depending on your location, you'll get them sometime in December before Christmas. Please note that this is an estimate, as you're pre-ordering the product and production delays could arise.

If you have additional questions, see this helpful FAQ for backers from Indiegogo.

QUALITY

  •  Why AUS-10 steel?
    We want the best of the best. Japanese AUS-10 steel is industry-leading for its hardness and durability while still being pliable and elastic enough for comfortable use and control. Our stainless steel Japanese AUS10 knives have HRC rating of 58-60, meaning it would always be ready to help you serve  the best food for your loved ones anytime!
  •  What is the steel’s Rockwell hardness level?
    Our stainless steel Japanese AUS10 knives have an HRC rating of 58-60 on the Rockwell scale.
  •  Is the knife forged or cast?
    The Ecriture Perfect Knives are forged.
  •  Why have the moving weight when you can hold the knife with a pinch grip?
    The ability to control the weight and balance simply gives you even more control and then additional versatility - you can do more with one knife instead of changing to knives with different weights and balances for various tasks.
  • It keeps moving like a pivot but how does the weight not interfere with hand motion?
    We have tested the knives extensively both with professional chefs and home cooks. They change their grip depending on use and none have had any issues with the grip and comfort when using.

SHIPPING & WARRANTY

  •  What does your warranty cover?
    The lifetime warranty covers the blade and knives under normal use conditions. PRO TIP: Don’t put your knives in a dishwasher. Not only will it damage your beautiful knife, it also won’t be covered by our warranty.
  •  When will my Perfect Knives be delivered?
    Before Christmas, but when you finally do get them, it will surely feel like an early Christmas!
  • How long does it take to ship to our place?
    All parcels will be delivered using Express courier service. Parcels will leave from either our US, French or Asian warehouse.                                               
  •  Is there VAT, duties or fees related to shipping?
    We cover all VAT and duty fees! You just pay for regular shipping costs. Just select your country after selecting your pledge.

KNIFE ENGRAVING

  •  Do you also offer logo engravings?
    No, at this time we only offer text engraving.
  •  How many characters can I use? Do you offer font customization?
    Yes! You can choose from 10 different fonts to write your 35 character message
  •  What are the fonts that you offer?
      You could find our font choice through this link < click me > 
  • Can I adjust the size of my engraving text?
    No, it is a fixed size. You can, however, choose out of 10 fonts.
  • Can I choose different texts for each knife if I bought a Complete / Essential collection?
    Yes, we want you to have the freedom to say what you want. The engraving is an add-on PER KNIFE, so you’ll be able to choose what each one says and the font for each individually (up to 35 characters).
  •  How long will the laser engraved etching last?
    Your engraving is made to last a lifetime. It is laser-engraved and further above the sharp blade, so it should not rub or wear down.
  •  Can I preview my engraving before I purchase it?
    At this time, no. You are able to specify exactly what you want it to say in the survey after the end of the Indiegogo campaign but currently, we do not provide previews. This is something we are looking into and trying to provide as soon as possible.

Risks and challenges

Because this isn't a tech product we don't expect to have big issues regarding production. The only delays could be related to quality control - we won't ship any damaged units, if something is not right we will make sure all defective units are corrected before leaving the warehouse. It might take a little time until the production line is fully operational and the employees know how to properly assemble the Écriture packages.

Learn about accountability on Indiegogo

story:
Motivation

Restaurants were severely hit by the Pandemic. For years this industry was stuck to a classical way of doing business, but the times are different now.

To survive, they need to be fully integrated with the modern Internet and media platforms. 

AppCafe is a holistic solution that provides restaurant with its own mobile application.

Unlike UberEats and similar projects, it's not a marketplace: the app intimately connects the place with its guests. Privacy is a key point: the app doesn't share your personal info and doesn't allow to sell it. 

 

Stage: Production

In fact, we have already covered 90% of the distance and even rolled out a beta-version in some countries. Although there is still a lot to do in terms of functionality improvement and marketing.

 

Key Features

For a typical user, the AppCafe app allows to:

  • Keep maximum privacy;
  • Order food online from the beloved restaurant;
  • Preorder takeaway;
  • Book the table;
  • Get bonuses and discount;
  • Track nutrition info;
  • Check trusted reviews on every menu item.

 

For a business owner, this extends with:

  • Advanced analytics;
  • CRM marketing and PUSH notification system;
  • Multiple room design for table booking interface;
  • Personalized special offers;
  • ...and a number of other marketing features.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The idea of this product was born well before the 2020 crisis - however, it pushed us pretty much to finalize the product ASAP.

Here are some challenges we are keeping in mind:

  • A lot of restaurant owners prefer an old-fashioned way of doing business and have to be convinced properly;
  • Localization for various non-English countries will be a massive task;
  • UberEats and similar marketplaces are competitors, but lack privacy and take up to 50% of the price, which makes restaurants pretty unhappy;
  • We'll need a solid support system and maximum technical perfection to grab and maintain  a significant market share. That is why we are starting with fundraising :)

 

 

Benefits & Ways to help

We received a huge amount of positive feedback on the pre-funding stage and are extremely grateful for everyone who wants to help.

In return, we include our backers in the list of special guests for every restaurant that joins AppCafe and uses our app. You will get up to 10% off forever!

  • Get 10% discount for $20 tip
  • Get 5% discount for $10 tip
  • If you are a restaurant owner, secure your own App for $500 tip
  • If you like our project, share this funding campaign on Social Media and get listed on our Sponsors page.

We will be happy with your contribution, regardless of it's amount.

 

Special Offer for Restaurant Owners

Our version 2.0 interface now includes an improved table booking interface and in-depth analytics page. The roll-out is planned for December, 2021.

If you are a restaurant owner, manager or representative, you can book your 1-year subscription for $500 instead of $1200 regular price with 58% discount — just pick our top perk!

Feel free to ask for any details via email michael@appcafe.org

Short Summary

Five years ago we began Possum Kingdom Kreamery because we loved our goats and goat milk and thought others might enjoy it as well.  Your response has been more than we could have ever dreamed!  It's been so successful that in the last five years we have added a variety of cheeses and even a caramel sauce to our line-up of offerings.  Now we want to provide you with Goat Milk Gelato! 

When we began with our milk and cheese we made it just for ourselves and a few friends. It quickly became more and we were able to offer it commercially. We currently make gelato for ourselves and some lucky friends, but we want to be able to share it with you too! In order to do that, however, we need a certain piece of equipment to obtain our permit to sell gelato, legally. 

We are a small family farm.  A new (quite expensive) piece of equipment will take us years to save up for, but, we are hoping that with your help, you won't have to wait that long!

 

What We Need

A commercial version of the ice cream machine we currently use is what is required for us to obtain our permit to make and sell gelato. The smallest one that fits our needs will cost around $4,000.00.

One hundred percent of the funds from this campaign will go into an account designated specifically for the purchase of the gelato machine.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is in a position to donate.  But there are other ways you can help!

  • Get the word out for us!  Share on social media whenever you can!
  • Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!

As always, thanks for your support!

story:
Local ingredients are used to create Apple Maple Bourbon, Chipotle, Cracked Pepper, Honey BBQ, Original, Peach Brandy Moonshine, Steak in a Pouch, Teriyaki & Carolina Red Reaper Jerky.  

The Greenville Jerky Company has a unique approach to making jerky. We call it Pasture to Pouch. Our collaboration with other like-minded dedicated Carolina farmers, chefs and food artisans focuses on high quality food sourcing and environmental sustainability. We make a nutritious jerky from Carolina grass-fed beef. A real and true Pasture to Pouch Jerky.

 

Where Does Your Money Go?

  • Reduce production costs with increased bulk purchasing power for ingredients.
  • Decrease cost of packaging through the purchase of equipment designed to assist in the labeling and sealing process.
  • Increase jerky production to meet customer’s demand.
  • Continued development of relationships and partnerships with local ranchers, farmers and chefs.
  • Expand the marketing message of the GJC brand.
  • Develop the online sales and social media networks.
  • Expand the wholesale distribution network.

If the entire goal is not achieved, we will positively move forward with the quality production process.  If funding allows we will work to lower the costs of packaging and printing.

What You Get in Return

Your contribution supports our local, family-owned business which in turn helps to sustain local area ranchers, farmers, food makers and other small businesses.

We are excited to offer seriously REAL outstanding Perks which include our excellent GJC jerky and cool jerky swag.  But there is more than what “meats" the eye… unique jerky opportunities, parties, jerky wear and jerky to share!  . You can join in to NAME YOUR OWN JERKY or choose from of our other JERKY PERKS!

The Impact

Growing the Greenville Jerky Company has been a labor of love, long days and nights and hard work.  Developing a jerky production business through strategic partnerships involves governmental approvals, local ranchers, food producers and support business. The successful expansion of GJC will impact the local economy and area businesses.

The offering of quality jerky positively impacts our customers' need to find  grass-fed jerky that has NO added nitrates or preservative and is lower in sodium and sugar. 

Our shop, Greenville Jerky & Vine already offered locally made Southern Fare. It was a natural progression to produce a local jerky.

Risks & Challenges

 Two main challenges we face are keeping the product local and maintaining product availability.

Your support allows us to:

  • Continue to cultivate relationships with local farmers and suppliers.
  • Continue with our local to local initiative.

Other Ways You Can Help

No worries if you don't have the cash to help us. Here are are several fun ways to support REAL JERKY made by GJC.

Facebook, www.facebook.com/greevillejerkyandvine, like and share our page.

Sharing what you like about our jerky with those close to you is a huge help!

Order on line: www.greenvillejerkycompany.com

 Encourage others to check out our campaign.  Thank YOU!
story_txt:
Local ingredients are used to create Apple Maple Bourbon, Chipotle, Cracked Pepper, Honey BBQ, Original, Peach Brandy Moonshine, Steak in a Pouch, Teriyaki & Carolina Red Reaper Jerky.  
The Greenville Jerky Company has a unique approach to making jerky. We call it Pasture to Pouch. Our collaboration with other like-minded dedicated Carolina farmers, chefs and food artisans focuses on high quality food sourcing and environmental sustainability. We make a nutritious jerky from Carolina grass-fed beef. A real and true Pasture to Pouch Jerky.
 

Where Does Your Money Go?


Reduce production costs with increased bulk purchasing power for ingredients.
